title: Proscenic
description:
"The Proscenic App is a mobile phone application that connects Proscenic smart products. You can control the functions of the product and monitor your product in real-time through the application. Here, you can control the product anytime and anywhere, and you can also streamline communication between smart devices. Intercommunication makes the product more portable and smart during use.

Linkage control, easy to use
We want you to experience a smarter and more portable lifestyle. The app is simple to operate and you can quickly add a variety of home appliances while performing linkage operations to interconnect smart devices.

Share your joy with just one-click 
We want to add more fun to your life. With simple one-click sharing, you can share your device with family and friends, manage it remotely, experience convenience, and enjoy the fun of science and technology together.

Connect to the Internet in no time
After connecting to your smart device, you can
(1) Start and pause your robot remotely
(2) View the cleaning map and understand the robot cleaning area
(3) Set the cleaning mode you want to track cleaning tasks

Download now and experience this house cleaning ""beast"" by Proscenic."

You can control and monitor all intelligent functions of Ultenic product through the app anytime and even if you are not at home. 
The Ultenic App is configurable on any smartphone.

Connecting your mobile phone to Ultenic intelligent product has never been easier! The Ultenic App is simple to use and quickly configure all your appliances and have them communicate with each other in a smart way. You can live in a smarter lifestyle at your fingertips.

Have fun while your Ultenic app work for you!
Share your device with your family and friends.
You can control your Ultenic device even if you're not at home, even if you're on the other side of the world.

title: Roborock
description:
*Feature support varies by product

Cutting-Edge Software and Hardware：
- PreciSense: Precision LIDAR navigation for efficient home cleaning.
- Sensient: A sensor matrix for safer movement around the home.
- OpticEye: Highly accurate vision-based motion control and navigation
- ReactiveAI: Artificial intelligence for recognizing and avoiding common home objects.
- VibraRise: More effective mopping through sonic vibration, with a mop that can be automatically lifted off the floor.

The Roborock app has been designed to give you total control over your Roborock robot, from home layout to cleaning schedules, cleaning strength, and more. Once you've set it up the way you want it, you can leave your robot to work. 

---- Feature Highlights ----

SERIOUSLY SMART MAPPING
After it's first run around your home, your Roborock robot will show you your floorplan and automatically divide your rooms, unlocking a world of customizations.

ADVANCED SCHEDULING
Set multiple schedules from hourly to daily to weekly, hitting different rooms with each one. You can clean the kitchen after breakfast and even the whole house when everyone's gone out.

CUSTOMIZABLE CLEANING
Tailor cleaning to the demands of each room. Crank up suction for the nursery, use more water on tiled kitchens, and lower suction when you need things quiet. The control is yours.

ZONE CLEANING
Draw up to five zones, and clean each zone up to three times, for when you want to tackle more stubborn dirt or just don't need entire rooms cleaned.

NO-GO ZONES
Use up to 10 No-Go Zones and 10 Invisible Walls to avoid thick carpets, keep robots away from delicate art, and more—all without a single hardware add-on.

MULTI-LEVEL MAPPING
Save up to four maps in your home and tailor cleaning to match each floor. Your robot will recognize the floor it's on automatically, so you can simply watch it work.

REAL-TIME VIEWING
Watch your robot move through your home, seeing the exact route it's taken and any obstacles it has avoided along the way.

Feature Compatibility:
- Multi-Level Mapping is available on [TBC] only
- Obstacle avoidance is available on S6 MaxV only
- Room specific suction scheduling is available on [TBC] only
- Room specific mopping is available on S6 MaxV and S5 Max only.

Contact Us
Customer Service Phone: 400-900-1755 (Chinese Mainland)
E-mail: service@roborock.com (Chinese Mainland), support@roborock-eu.com (EU), support@roborock.com (Other Areas)

title: Xbot Home
descriptionHTML:
The mobile phone app connects Xbot products to the phone with Wi-Fi function.

Using the App, you replace the traditional remote control with an intelligent robot control.

The Application provides registration, initial setup, software update, cleaning control, management and receiving information from the robot vacuum cleaner.

You can adapt the robot to your lifestyle:

- make an individual cleaning schedule;

- mark contaminated and restricted areas;

- customize local cleaning and cleaning zones in specific rooms;

- adjust the cleaning modes;

- Get information about the charge level, cleaning report and error messages.

title: MOVAhome
description:
MOVAhome App is a professional cleaning management tool that developed specifically for MOVA robotic vacuum cleaners. Connect with your MOVA robot through MOVAhome App to remotely control and personalize the management of cleaning spaces and schedules, giving you control of your home’s floor cleaning anytime, anywhere. Unlock a variety of advanced features with ease through the MOVAhome App:

Device Information: Monitor your robot in real-time to precisely track its cleaning progress and path, work status, any malfunctions or anomalies, and the lifespan of cleaning consumables.

Remote Control: Connect with the device to remotely control the robot, set cleaning schedules, and adjust various parameters such as water flow and suction power.

Zone Selection & Cleaning Customization: Select and customize cleaning areas through an intuitive map interface, pinpointing the exact locations you wish to clean.

Scheduled Cleaning: Set up timed cleaning appointments, and the robot will start the task at the designated time and autonomously return to its charging dock upon completion.

Home Mapping: Create a personalized home map with custom room names and divided areas, and plan settings like floor material and cleaning sequence to meet the needs of your family.

No-Go Zones: Set no-go zones on your map, ensuring that the robot avoids these areas during cleaning to prevent entry into designated off-limits spaces.

Firmware Upgrades: Update your robot to the latest firmware version with a single click through OTA technology, and be among the first to experience cutting-edge features.

Voice Connection: Register and log into the app to connect with your robot, enabling compatibility with third-party voice assistant platforms for convenient voice control functions.

Contact Us
• Email: aftersales@mova-tech.com
• Website: https://global.mova-tech.com/

title: AllyBot
description:
AllyBot is an intelligent cleaning robot with autonomous positioning and navigation capabilities. It can automatically return to charge and continue to clean, and support cross-floor tasks by elevator and flexible task scheduling. You can control the robot in real time through phone, create and start cleaning tasks remotely, manage and schedule multiple devices. Convenient operation and management of the robot can easily be realized.
· Multi-device management--Scan QR code or enter SN number to quickly add robot to manage.
· Multiple cleaning modes—There are three cleaning modes, including vacuuming, scrubbing and dust wiping, and various strengths, such as silence, standard and power, etc.
· Master robot at any time--Remotely monitor the real-time status of the robot: online/offline, working/ idle, charging, etc.
· Scenario intelligent planning-- Multi-type zoning: Never go to the forbidden area, walk around the virtual wall, work lightly in the carpet area, walk slowly in the slope area, and set various marking points such as charging and taking the elevator.
· Personalized Cleaning--Timed or quick tasks, multiple cleaning modes, and cross-floor tasks by elevator to meet different cleaning needs.
· Automatically recharge --Robot will automatically recharge when the battery is low, and automatically continue to clean after it is fully charged.
· Remote control--One-click switch to remote control mode, and control robot to move, map, clean or record planning.

title: ECOVACS PRO
description:
ECOVACS PRO App is a mobile application for connecting to ECOVACS commercial robots, supporting commercial cleaning robots such as DEEBOT PRO M1, K1 VAC, and other robot products. Through the app, you can view the robot status in real time, edit maps, schedule tasks, view robot cleaning reports, and more, to start a new commercial cleaning experience.


By connecting to ECOVACS PRO App, you can easily unlock more features:

【Convenient Deployment】

1. Multiple mapping methods.

2. Intelligent optimization of maps.

3. Path-based map editing.

4. Efficient storage across multiple platforms.

【Intelligent Remote Control】

1. Comprehensive monitoring of robot status.

2. Flexible task combinations.

3. Multi-dimensional visualization of data.

4. Convenient remote control.

5. Unified management for multiple machines and roles.

【Intelligent Scheduling】

1. Interconnection of multiple machines.

2. Data sharing.

3. Centralized intelligent scheduling resources.

4. Autonomous coordination.

title: RoboKit
description:
We have released the RoboKit mobile application with which you can remotely control Kitfort robots.
On the first launch of the application, select a robot and connect it.
After connecting, you can control the robot while away from home. For example, on leaving work, go to the application and click on the Start button. You will come home to a nice clean floor.
To avoid having to press a button every time you can set a cleaning schedule for the whole week.
From the RoboKit application, you can not only start cleaning, but also change cleaning modes and instruct the robot to charge itself.
While moving the robot draws a cleaning map and displays it in the mobile application.
The RoboKit mobile app team is constantly working on improving features and functionality of the product.
In the near future we will launch more robots that can be controlled from the application and provide even more opportunities for users of our smart devices.
If you have any questions or suggestions, please write to us at info@kitfort.ru
Official website: https://kirfort.ru/

description:

Whether at home or outside, you can let the robot perform daily cleaning tasks independently.All you need to do is appreciate its efficient cleaning function and enjoy a warm and clean home environment.

1)View the real-time map, the robot builds the map in real time during the cleaning, allowing you to see its work at a glance.

2)Remote cleaning, simple operation can remotely control all the functions of the machine, cleaning anytime, anywhere.

3)Make an appointment for cleaning and set the time for daily cleaning work to meet your exclusive cleaning customization.

4)Support multiple cleaning modes to switch easily.

title: Rowenta Robots
description:
Tired of handling everyday chores ? Your Rowenta robots application will allow you to start the cleaning of your home wherever you are. Discover several features that enhance the experience and life expectancy of your product !

CONTROL THE CLEANING OF YOUR HOME : Launch a cleaning session directly from your phone : Your robot will explore and create a map of your home*. You will have fun watching the robot cleaning and cover the entirety of your house or a specific space.

PERSONALISE THE MAP OF YOUR HOME : After the first creation of the map by your robot vacuum cleaner, assign the rooms, determine which areas your robot needs to avoid. You can even create levels to draw your entire house.** 

ADAPT YOUR CLEANING : Change the suction speed of your robot according to the type of floor you have. Let the robot recognize and avoid the objects while cleaning thanks to artificial intelligence (AI).**

EXTEND THE LIFE EXPECTANCY OF YOUR ROBOT : Thanks to the maintenance feature, get advices on how to clean and replace the components of your product. You can also buy accessories directly from your app. 

SCHEDULE YOUR NEXT CLEANING SESSION : Forgot to pass the vacuum this weekend ? Your robot can be scheduled in advance to clean your home whenever you want. 

CHECK YOUR PREVIOUS CLEANING SESSIONS : Have a look at your robot’s history to see when it’s time to start cleaning again ! You will also know the duration of all your previous sessions.

*except Explorer Series 40, 45, 50, 60
**only for specific products

title: Kachaka
description:
With the ease of moving furniture, you can create new layouts without changing the size of the room.
With smart furniture, your room can serve as a living room, dining room, or kitchen.
Incorporate 'autonomous furniture movement' into your everyday life.



● Easy Control with Shortcuts
Set up shortcuts for the furniture you move daily through the app, enabling a one-tap movement.

● Intuitive Understanding of Kachaka's Status
Grasp an intuitive understanding of Kachaka's current position, scanned room layout, destinations, and other various information.

● Schedule Function for Habit Formation and Forgetfulness Prevention
Specify dates and days to have Kachaka bring furniture to you. Whether it's having your bag and watch brought to the entrance every morning, your reading stack by the bed every night, or snacks delivered from the kitchen to your study desk during snack time, how you utilize Kachaka is up to you.

● Other Convenient Features
Designate no-entry zones where you don’t want Kachaka to enter.
Remote control operation to move Kachaka.
Command Kachaka with voice commands without opening the app.



Requirements:
* The real robot "Kachaka" is required for use. Sales are only conducted within Japan.
* Compatible with Android 5.0 and later.

title: Redroad
description:
The Redroad app has been designed to total control your robot, from home layout to cleaning schedules, cleaning strength, and more. Once you've set it up the way you want it, you can leave your robot to work.

---- Feature Highlights ----

SERIOUSLY SMART MAPPING
After it's first run around your home, your Redroad robot will show you your floorplan and automatically divide your rooms, unlocking a world of customizations.

ADVANCED SCHEDULING
Set multiple schedules from hourly to daily to weekly, hitting different rooms with each one. 

CUSTOMIZABLE CLEANING
Users can choose "free" and "intelligent" control of the App to switch the cleaning mode at will, helping users in complex environments (with children, pets, too many rooms, and many ground items), and in different areas (kitchen, bedroom, living room, toilet, etc.) to complete different modes of cleaning.

ZONE CLEANING
Draw up to five zones when you want to tackle more stubborn dirt or just don't need the entire room cleaned.

MULTI-LEVEL MAPPING
Save up to five maps in your home and tailor cleaning to match each floor. Your robot will recognize the floor it's on automatically, so you can simply watch it work.

Contact Us
Customer Service Phone: +852-6647-3087
E-mail: info@redroadglobal.com

title: EnroSmartXP
description:
This app enables the user to control and manage the autonomous cleaning robot developed and distributed by Schauer Agrotronic GmbH.
After registering the smartphone, the user can connect to the EnRo robot.

The following functions can then be used.
* Move the robot in manual mode.
* Start/pause and stop individual routes.
* Manage daily routines. (Deactivate/activate daily routine and daily points).
* Request status information. (Sensor data, state of the robots, ...).
* Change settings. (Time, synchronisation, calibration of sensors, ...)

title: Roomba Home
description:
The Roomba® Home App is compatible with Roomba® 100, 200, 400, 500 and 700 series robots sold after March 2025. For other models, please download the iRobot Home (Classic) app.

Get ready to elevate your cleaning game with the intuitive Roomba® Home app! Easily start, stop, or schedule your robot, adjust cleaning settings, customize detailed maps of your home, and create personalized cleaning routines. Dirty rooms are noted based upon previous cleaning jobs to help you clean more effectively without having to think about it. See where and how your robot is cleaning in real-time, proactive product maintenance, and seamless smart home integrations. From setup to daily use, the Roomba® Home app offers intelligent recommendations and a user-friendly experience to keep your home spotless with minimal effort.

• Easy, Seamless Setup: Easy-to-follow onboarding guides you from unboxing to your first cleaning run with helpful tips along the way.

• Cleaning Routines: Effortlessly create cleaning routines with Routine Builder. Select which rooms to clean, adjust settings, and turn on advanced scrubbing to clean just the way you like.

• Schedules: Easily adjust the days and times your robot cleans so it runs when it’s most convenient for you.

• Cleaning Settings: Choose to vacuum, mop or both, and adjust settings like suction & mopping liquid levels, number of cleaning passes and turn on advanced scrubbing to clean each room just the way you like.

• Maps: Save up to 5 maps, label rooms, add zones and furniture for more targeted cleaning control, and start cleaning specific areas with a click.

• Real-Time Insights: See where and how your robot is cleaning and manage it along the way with real-time controls.

• Voice Control: Hands full? No need to stop what you're doing. Alexa, Siri or Google Assistant-enabled* compatibility allows you to clean with a simple command.

• Robot Maintenance & Health Dashboard: Keep your robot operating smoothly and in tip-top shape with a list of maintenance and troubleshooting suggestions, while the Health Dashboards monitors robot and accessories health.


Note: Roomba® 100 series products require a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi® network. Not compatible with 5GHz Wi-Fi® networks.


*Works with Alexa, Siri, and Google Assistant-enabled devices. Alexa and all related logos are trademarks of Amazon.com or its affiliates. Google and Google Home are trademarks of Google LLC. Siri is a registered trademark of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries and regions.

ZACO Robot is a mobile phone application of connecting the ZACO cleaner robotic products, which supports the robotic customization products with WIFI function under the ZACO brand. It can not only replace the traditional remote controller , but also can present more working data that cannot be displayed by the conventional remote controller. Through the APP, the user can remotely control and reserve robots for cleaning while away from home, making you to enjoy smart life anytime, anywhere.

*This version only works with ZACO V5x (bought before mid 2020), V85, A8s, A9s.

description:
ETA Raggio is the official application for robot vacuum cleaner ETA5225 with various functions.

Main features:
- control the robot with smart device
- Intelligent scheduled cleaning - choose a day, time and zone of cleaning
- up to 10 cleaning zones and restricted areas 
- detailed map of cleaning room
- distance control even outside your home
- monitor current operation and cleaning history
- up to 10 accounts to be paired with one robot
- cleaning modes: auto, zone, spot
- robot maintenance notifications (replace filters, side brush, main brush etc.)
- Errors diagnostic
- virtual remote control
- do not disturb function
- 3 levels of suction power

title: INXNI
description:
The inner APP is a sweeping robot control application. You can control your sweeping robot to clean anytime, anywhere, as you like; check various status and cleaning completion status at any time.
Through the APP, you can easily unlock the following functions:
[Selected area cleaning] You can select a designated room for cleaning. After selection, only the selected room will be cleaned, and the cleaning will be performed according to the selected order.
[Zone cleaning] Select the area you want to clean on the map, and set the number of cleanings to achieve key cleaning.
[Forbidden area setting] Set the forbidden area. After setting, the robot will not enter the forbidden area when cleaning.
[Scheduled cleaning] Schedule a cleaning task, and the robot will start the cleaning task at the specified time.
[Partition editing] After the robot is automatically partitioned, the partitions can be edited manually, which can be merged, divided and named.

title: Philips HomeRun Robot App
description:
Unlock the full potential of your Philips HomeRun robot. Tell it exactly how and when to clean each room and mow your lawn. Then, relax.
 
With the Philips HomeRun Robot app you can:
● Start, pause or stop cleaning and mowing remotely
● Make a precise map of your home to clean each room in no time
● Control where your robot cleans and mows
● Choose a cleaning mode per room and mowing mode per lawn
● Set up once, enjoy spotless floors and lawns daily
● Custom clean and mow for specific situations
● Get step-by-step guidance to set up easily
● Receive progress updates on each clean and mow
● Keep your data secure
 
Start, pause or stop your robot remotely
Come home to clean floors and a perfect-looking garden every day by using your Philips HomeRun vacuum, mop, and lawn mowing robot in combination with the app. Set it up once—to clean each room and mow your lawn just the way you like it—touch ‘Start’, anytime, anywhere, and let your robot do the rest.
On its first run, your robot will map your floor plan and garden. Now you have an interactive map of your home that you can use to tell your robot how and when to clean each room or to monitor how your lawn is mowed. The robot vacuum cleaner can store up to five maps.
 
Control where your robot vacuum cleaner cleans
Only want your robot to clean the kitchen, bathroom, living room? With the app, you can tell your robot which rooms you want cleaned, and in what order. If there are areas or things you’d like it to avoid—like precious items or a rug in an area you want to mop—you can tell it where not to go, or not to mop, as well.

Choose a cleaning mode for each room and mowing mode for each lawn
Give each room unique attention with one of the cleaning modes and mowing modes for your lawn. Use Dry mode to vacuum the bedroom and Wet & Dry mode to vacuum and mop hard floors. Put your robot on Quiet mode if, say, you have a meeting, or give the kitchen an extra thorough clean by using Intensive mode. Choose a mowing mode for your lawn to get the perfect looking garden.
 
Set up once. Enjoy spotless floors and lawns every day
Once you’ve created a cleaning and mowing plan, clean floors and perfectly mowed lawns are always a tap away. Tap ‘Start’ when you want your robot to begin - every day if you like, and at a time that suits your schedule.
 
Custom clean for specific situations
Had friends over and need an extra thorough clean? Or maybe the dog left paw prints in your hallway. Again. Schedule a custom clean and mow that targets specific rooms, areas.
 
Get step-by-step guidance to setup easily
From connecting to Wi-Fi to the first clean and mow, we’ll guide you through every step of getting started. You’ll find easy-to-follow instructions and how-to-videos as well.
 
Always have support at your fingertips
Have extra questions about the HomeRun app and robot? You’ll find a user manual in the app, answers to FAQs and easy access to Customer Care if need be.
 
Receive progress updates
As your robot cleans and mows, you’ll receive in-app updates. See where your robot currently is in your home and what the robot mowing progress is in your garden. Check on its battery levels and, most importantly, get notified as soon as the cleaning run or mowing is done 
 
Maintain high performance
Get the best performance from your robot by replacing parts on time. Our app lets you know when it’s time to replace parts like filters, mops, and blades, and makes it easy to order them.
 
Keep your data secure
Philips adheres to a strict privacy policy. We recommend creating an account to ensure you can save your preferences. If you prefer, you can use the app as a guest. 
 
WiFi
Philips HomeRun robot vacuum cleaners have dual band Wi-Fi so they are easy to connect to your home Wi-Fi, whether it's to 2.4 or 5.0GHz. Robot lawn mowers only connect to your 2.4GHz home Wi-Fi.
 
Need help?
Visit www.Philips.com to find answers to our most frequently asked questions, or get in touch with our Consumer Care team.

title: HonySmart
description:
Through the HonySmart app, you can easily unlock the following advanced features:
[Map Save](Only applicable to some devices) Turn on the map save mode, and after operating according to regulations, advanced functions such as room zoning, merging and segmentation can be achieved, while improving cleaning efficiency. 
[Virtual Walls and Restricted Areas] Set up virtual walls and restricted areas, ready to use and set, so that the robot will not cross the virtual wall or enter the restricted area during cleaning.
[Timing Cleaning] If you make an appointment a scheduled cleaning task, and the robot will start the cleaning task at the designated time. After completion, it will automatically return to the charging station.
[Selected Area  Cleaning] (Only applicable to some devices) You can choose to specify a room for cleaning. After selection, only the selected room will be cleaned, and you can clean wherever you want.
[Spot Cleaning] Click on the location to be cleaned on the map, and after clicking Start, the robot will automatically plan the path to the target point and perform local cleaning.
[Resume Cleaning] When the battery level is below 20%, the robot automatically plans the shortest path to return to the charging station for charging: after fully charging, return to the unfinished area and continue cleaning.

title: U Vacuum
description:
U Vacuum is an advanced technology-driven application that will lead you into an unprecedented smart home cleaning experience. As the central control system for the V10 robot vacuum, U Vacuum focus on providing intuitive and comprehensive operational services, allowing you to easily enjoy a smart cleaning journey at your fingertips.

By downloading and installing U Vacuum, you will be able to remotely control and track the working status of the V10 anytime, anywhere. With just one click, you can activate a super strong suction mode up to 10 times higher or customize various cleaning plans. Whether it's setting up cleaning restricted areas, virtual walls, achieving selective area cleaning, freely dividing cleaning areas, or even flexibly adjusting the cleaning sequence, everything can be done as you wish to meet the different cleaning needs of various functional areas in your home.

U Vacuum always pays attention to the operation status of the V10 robot vacuum,  providing you with feedback on the device's status to ensure it is always in optimal condition. This ensures that efficient cleaning and worry-free use go hand in hand, jointly building your ideal smart living space.

APP Intelligent Control
 Real time map: the map will be created simultaneously when robot start cleaning, you could see the working situation clearly through the APP.
 Control anywhere, anytime: easy control all functions of robot through the APP, Cleaning at anywhere, anytime
 Schedule: make the reservation for day to day cleaning working, cater for your customized cleaning requirements.
 Software update: understand the robot’s updated status through APP prompt, keep your robot with best performance.
 Multi-purpose: Not only can start, stop, pause cleaning and recharging, but support switching for multiple cleaning modes—standard, turbo, eco
summary: RedkeyRobot APP can control your Robot wherever

title: HiRobot
description:
HiRobot App is the mobile application of Haier's overseas robot products. You can complete the functional control of the robot through the App, and easily unlock smart and clean life.

【Equipment Information】
Working status, mode selection, fault information and so on at a glance.
[Appointment for cleaning]
According to your living habits and work hours, personalized robot working hours.
【 Clean area 】
The selected room in the map is divided into regions to quickly realize the cleaning of the designated area.
【Restricted Area Setting】
By manually setting the restricted area and virtual wall, avoid the robot entering the area you do not want to clean.
【Firmware upgrade】
The robot can be updated, unlocked and optimized through remote OTA.
Note: The actual function of the specific model shall prevail.

Official website: https://www.haier.com

title: iRobot Home (Classic)
description:
The classic iRobot Home App is compatible with older Roomba®, Braava® and Klaara™ products, including Roomba® or Roomba Combo® e, i, s, m, j, Essential, Essential 2, and 10 Max series robots. For other Roomba® models, please download the Roomba® Home app.

Take control of cleaning your home with the classic iRobot Home app. The easy-to-use app offers enhanced maps, room, zone and object-specific cleaning, customized scheduling, personalized cleaning suggestions, and simple smart home integrations with Alexa, Siri, and Google Assistant-enabled devices*, all designed to make sure you get the most out of your iRobot floor cleaning robots. Feature availability varies by model.

*Works with Alexa, Siri, and Google Assistant-enabled devices. Alexa and all related logos are trademarks of Amazon.com or its affiliates. Google and Google Home are trademarks of Google LLC. Siri is a registered trademark of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries and regions.

title: Vactronic
description:
"The Vactronic App is a mobile phone application that connects Vactronic smart products. You can control the functions of the product and monitor your product in real-time through the application. Here, you can control the product anytime and anywhere, and you can also streamline communication between smart devices. Intercommunication makes the product more portable and smart during use.


Linkage control, easy to use
We want you to experience a smarter and more portable lifestyle. The app is simple to operate and you can quickly add a variety of home appliances while performing linkage operations to interconnect smart devices.

Share your joy with just one-click 
We want to add more fun to your life. With simple one-click sharing, you can share your device with family and friends, manage it remotely, experience convenience, and enjoy the fun of science and technology together.

Connect to the Internet in no time
After connecting to your smart device, you can
(1) Start and pause your robot remotely
(2) View the cleaning map and understand the robot cleaning area
(3) Set the cleaning mode you want to track cleaning tasks

Download now and experience this house cleaning ""beast"" by Vactronic."

title: Poolmate Bot
description:
"Intelligent Control with APP, Just Effort-Free
   CHASING CM600 can be remotely controlled with the CHASING GO3 APP. The APP has functions such as scheduled cleaning (timer/delay), unattended operation, and one-key recycling. Other than the intelligent one-tap cleaning, you can also clean your pool using the lag-free manual mode.
descriptionHTML:
"Intelligent Control with APP, Just Effort-Free
CHASING CM600 can be remotely controlled with the CHASING GO3 APP. The APP has functions such as scheduled cleaning (timer/delay), unattended operation, and one-key recycling. Other than the intelligent one-tap cleaning, you can also clean your pool using the lag-free manual mode.
summary: Intelligent and convenient; comprehensive cleaning

title: Robot Sweeper
description:
Connecting to the Robot Cleaner APP you can unlock the following functions.
Device information: You can display information about device functions, working status, fault exceptions, consumables life, etc. 
House map: By building a floor cleaning house map, you can personalize the name, zone, and set the rooms and areas you want to clean.
Suction power level: Four levels of suction power can be switched to personalize the level you need according to the dirtiness of the area you are cleaning.
Appointment cleaning: You can personalize the time and number of times the machine works according to your living habits and cleaning needs.
Firmware upgrade: With OTA technology, you can constantly upgrade the firmware version of your robot to experience smarter continuous improvement.
descriptionHTML:
Connecting to the Robot Cleaner APP you can unlock the following functions.
Device information: You can display information about device functions, working status, fault exceptions, consumables life, etc.
House map: By building a floor cleaning house map, you can personalize the name, zone, and set the rooms and areas you want to clean.
Suction power level: Four levels of suction power can be switched to personalize the level you need according to the dirtiness of the area you are cleaning.
Appointment cleaning: You can personalize the time and number of times the machine works according to your living habits and cleaning needs.
Firmware upgrade: With OTA technology, you can constantly upgrade the firmware version of your robot to experience smarter continuous improvement.
summary: Smart apps for floor sweepers that customize your needs!

title: ETA Navaggio
description:
Basic characteristics:
- Intelligent cleaning planning - the possibility of setting individual days, hours and with the possibility of setting individual rooms
- Automatic division of rooms after obtaining a map with the possibility of subsequent editing
- Delimitation of forbidden zones (up to 10) and zones for current zone cleaning (up to 10)
- Creation of up to 5 maps of vacuumed areas
- If the application is connected to the Internet, the vacuum cleaner can be controlled remotely even if you are not at home
- Monitoring the current state and movement of the vacuum cleaner; including history
- The vacuum cleaner can be controlled from multiple user accounts
- Choice of cleaning mode: automatic, zone, local, double
- Warning of the need to maintain individual parts of the vacuum cleaner
- It also allows manual guidance of the vacuum cleaner
- DO NOT DISTURB function at an adjustable time of day
- Setting of suction power and moping intensity - 3 levels
descriptionHTML:
Basic characteristics:
- Intelligent cleaning planning - the possibility of setting individual days, hours and with the possibility of setting individual rooms
- Automatic division of rooms after obtaining a map with the possibility of subsequent editing
- Delimitation of forbidden zones (up to 10) and zones for current zone cleaning (up to 10)
- Creation of up to 5 maps of vacuumed areas
- If the application is connected to the Internet, the vacuum cleaner can be controlled remotely even if you are not at home
- Monitoring the current state and movement of the vacuum cleaner; including history
- The vacuum cleaner can be controlled from multiple user accounts
- Choice of cleaning mode: automatic, zone, local, double
- Warning of the need to maintain individual parts of the vacuum cleaner
- It also allows manual guidance of the vacuum cleaner
- DO NOT DISTURB function at an adjustable time of day
- Setting of suction power and moping intensity - 3 levels
summary: Application for controlling the robotic vacuum cleaner ETA2228 and ETA4228.

title: Robot Vac
description:
The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum app  allows you to conveniently connect and control your robot anytime and anywhere from your mobile device. 
The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum 
Features: 
•	Clean your house whether you are home or away 
•	Set future cleaning sessions that work for your busy schedule 
•	Choose between 4 cleaning modes including: Auto, Spot, Edge, and Single Room
•	Control the robots cleaning strength with Eco, Normal and Turbo modes
•	Remotely check the status of your robot – including the battery level, cleaning mode, and more
•	Access instruction manuals, FAQ’s and more
The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum 
Requirements: 
•	Supports model numbers 31510 and XXXX
•	Wi-Fi with 2.4GHz band support
•	Mobile device with Apple iOS9 or later 
The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum app
Visit Kenmore.com for additional support or call our customer service team at 1-877-531-7321
descriptionHTML:
The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum app allows you to conveniently connect and control your robot anytime and anywhere from your mobile device.
The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum
Features:
• Clean your house whether you are home or away
• Set future cleaning sessions that work for your busy schedule
• Choose between 4 cleaning modes including: Auto, Spot, Edge, and Single Room
• Control the robots cleaning strength with Eco, Normal and Turbo modes
• Remotely check the status of your robot – including the battery level, cleaning mode, and more
• Access instruction manuals, FAQ’s and more
The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum

The Kenmore Smart Robot Vacuum app

title: ETA AQUILO
description:
Basic characteristics:
 - Intelligent cleaning planning - the possibility of setting individual days, hours and with the option of setting individual rooms
 - Automatic division of rooms after obtaining the map with the possibility of subsequent editing
 - Definition of prohibited zones and zones for current zone cleaning
 - Creation of multiple maps of vacuumed spaces
 - If the application is connected to the Internet, the vacuum cleaner can be controlled remotely even if you are away from home
 - Monitoring the current status and movement of the vacuum cleaner; including history
 - The vacuum cleaner can be controlled from multiple user accounts
 - Choice of cleaning mode: automatic, zone, local, double, along the walls
 - Warning about the necessity of maintenance of individual parts of the vacuum cleaner
 - It also enables manual guidance of the vacuum cleaner
 - Do Not Disturb function at adjustable time of day
 - Adjustment of suction power and mopping intensity

title: RVC connect
description:
The modern way to clean your house is easy, requires minimal effort and with great results.

Providing an easy and convenient way to maintain a clean home is what we aim for. That enables you to spend your time, a highly valued asset, on whatever you prefer.

- Local languages (EN/NO/SE/FI/DK/DE)
- Detailed customized schedules
- Specific carpet and wet-mop settings
- Customizable settings for vacuuming, wet-mopping and combinations.
- Easy map customization and information
- No mop zones, no go zones and virtual walls
- Much more…

Compatible with (not exhaustive):
Wilfa Innobot RVC-D4000LIN, RVC-D4000SL, RVC-D4000SL+, RVC-D4000AI, RVC-B4LIN, RVC-B4LIN+, RVC-W4LIN+

title: iCLEBO O5
description:
Try various and convenient features of iCLEBO O5 App.

- Remote Cleaning
- My Cleaning Mode
- My Home Map
- Non-Cleaning Zone
- Schedule Cleaning
- Software Update
- Other Functions


# REMOTE CLEANING

Start and stop clean, change cleaning mode, and use more functions anytime, anywhere!


# MY CLEANING MODE

Set a customized cleaning mode to your preference.


# MY HOME MAP

Monitor cleaning status with real-time map.


# NON-CLEANING ZONE

Draw non-cleaning zone on a saved map for iCLEBO to skip the area.


# SCHEDULE CLEANING

Set cleaning schedule any day of the week at your convenient time.


# SOFTWARE UPDATE

Check your robot status with the App. and on-time software update is avaialble.


# VOICE CONTROL

Simply speak up!  iCLEBO O5 is compatiable with Alexa/Google Assistant in United States.


# VOICE REPORT

iCLEBO O5 speaks as well! Easily find out the status of your robot.


# OTHER FUNCTIONS

Register your iCLEBO and create a nickname
Purchase robot accessories at iCLEBO Store

title: icotech
description:
The icotech APP allows you to remotely control your laser sweeping robot through your mobile phone whether you are at home or when you are out, allowing the robot to perform daily cleaning tasks autonomously. All you need to do is admire its efficient cleaning ability and enjoyment a warm and clean home environment.

APP intelligent control
1) Check the real-time map, the robot builds the map in real time during cleaning, so that you can see its working situation at a glance
2) Remote cleaning, simple operation can remotely control all functions of the machine, one-key cleaning anytime, anywhere
3) Make an appointment for cleaning and set the time for daily cleaning work to meet your exclusive cleaning needs
4) It can start, stop, suspend cleaning and recharging, and also supports multiple cleaning mode switching - high-performance cleaning/energy-saving mode

title: Commodore
description:
The Commodore app is designed to give you full control over your Commodore robot, from apartment plan to cleaning schedules, cleaning strength and more. Once you've set it up the way you want it, you can let your robot work completely on its own.

In addition to the conventional control options of the remote control
The following are also available to you with the app
Functions available:
• Location-independent control of the robotic vacuum cleaner and the
Planned time
• Check and manage the maps of the area created by the vacuum robot
and the cleaning history
• Selection of the areas to be cleaned by the robot vacuum cleaner
(e.g. individual rooms)
• Establishing virtual exclusion zones and boundaries
• Choice of all cleaning modes (including spot mode) and
Adjustment of the suction power
• Regulation of water consumption
• Changing / deactivating the pre-programmed rest time

title: Bluebot Robotics
description:
The Bluebot Robotics Robot Vacuum APP is a mobile application that connects to Bluebot Robotics robot products. 
Users can replace the traditional remote control with APP, remote control the robot to clean, dock to charge, etc.
Equipment control, support direction control, cleaning preferences settings, etc.
Time Schedule, clean at any time within a week.
Equipment positioning, can view the data of cleaning area and cleaning time.
Support personalized settings of device name, time calibration, deleting equipment, etc.
If you have any questions or suggestions during use, please contact us by email，Mail address:  support@blaupunktrobotics.eu

title: Guide for Mi Robot Vacuum Mop
description:
Guide for Mi Robot Vacuum Mop app

In this guide app for Mi Robot Vacuum mop, the features of the device, how to setup and use it, routine maintenance and solutions to potential problems are explained.

When the Xiaomi robot vacuum-mop is cleaned in the mode you set, it automatically returns to the charging slot to recharge.

The Xiaomi Mi Robot vacuum mop is only for floor cleaning in a home environment. Do not use outdoors, on unfloored surfaces, in a commercial or industrial environment. You can control your device by pairing it with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. Mi Robot scans the home environment while on the go, allowing the creation of a cleaning plan.



This guide application provides quite good information regarding connect with mi home xiaomi home app and installing accessories for desired mode, below is a summary description of the product.

Tangki air 200 ml yang dikendalikan secara elektronik dilengkapi dengan 3 pengaturan ketinggian air, untuk mengendalikan aliran air secara efektif, mencegah rembesan, dan melindungi lantai kayu dan ubin Anda dari kerusakan. Dilengkapi 4 setelan isap untuk berbagai ruangan dan berbagai jenis kotoran.

Mudah menangani segala kotoran, dari benda seukuran kacang polong hingga debu dan rambut. Daya isap merupakan kunci pembersihan. Motor Nidec Jepang memberikan daya isap 2200 Pa* untuk menghilangkan debu lantai dengan cepat dan membersihkan celah secara menyeluruh.

title: iHome Clean
description:
iHome Clean 

The iHome Clean App gives you full control over your iHome AutoVac

The iHome Clean App will walk you through the steps to connect your iHome AutoVac to your 2.4G Wi-Fi for full access to the iHome Clean App’s Features:

Control iHome AutoVac Cleaning
- Start and Stop Cleaning from Anywhere
- Set your Cleaning Schedule 
- Send your iHome AutoVac back to the Charging Base
- View the Autovac cleaning path with Homemap Technology 
- Control the suction modes with the Hyperdrive Technology 
- View cleaning history - duration and floor area
- Control your iHome AutoVac Manually w/ D-pad control
- Manage Shared Users


Requirements
- Wi-Fi with 2.4GHz band support 
- Autovac Eclipse, Juno, Luna,  Nova, Halo or Orbita

Visit iHomeClean.com for additional Support and Information.

title: Peppermint Services
description:
Revolutionize Your Operations with the Peppermint Services App!

Stay connected to your intelligent service robots like never before. The Peppermint Services app empowers you to monitor and manage your assets in real-time, making it easier than ever to optimize your workflows.

Key Features:

Real-Time Alerts: Receive instant updates from your robots to ensure seamless operations.
Asset Insights: Access detailed usage information to track performance and maximize efficiency.
Customizable Notifications: Enable or disable alerts for specific assets based on your preferences.
Stay In Control: Get push notifications to stay informed about your robots’ status, anytime, anywhere.

At Peppermint Robotics, we’re dedicated to automating mundane, repetitive workflows in commercial and industrial environments. Let the Peppermint Services app take your operations to the next level with smarter robot management.

Download now and transform the way you work!

title: Homeland
description:
With the Homeland app you can connect your robot vacuum cleaner to your home Wi-Fi and control it from your Smartphone.

This app is compatible with all Homeland models that have a Wi-Fi connection. Includes customizable cleaning modes so you can choose the one that suits your needs at all times. With the Homeland app you can program your vacuum cleaner on a daily or weekly basis and keep your house always clean. You can also modify the power parameters when you need it most.

Homeland, elegance made robot.

title: TECHNIMAX
description:
Virtual no-go zones
With virtual no-go zones, the robot can be kept away from living areas or entire rooms. Simply define arbitrarily large exclusion zones.

area cleaning
In addition to the entire apartment, individual rooms and areas can also be cleaned. Furthermore, these can be named personally and the suction power can be set individually for each room / area.


remote access
Start or stop the cleaning at any time while on the move or track the cleaning progress in real time.

calendar
The regular cleaning can be easily adjusted via a calendar. Choose the time and the days - the robot will automatically clean at the scheduled time.

Notifications
The TECHNIMAX app offers the possibility of displaying the current status of the robot, eg B a full dust container or a blocked brush to retrieve. In addition to this information, the app also provides appropriate solutions to all sorts of issues that can be reported directly through the app.

WIRELESS INTERNET ACCESS
The connection between the robot and the TECHNIMAX app takes place via the home network and requires a standard WLAN router with a 2.4 GHz band.

remote access

title: Airbot X40
description:
Welcome to the world of Airbot, where smart living meets simplicity. As a devoted homemaker, I've found the perfect partner in keeping my home spotless and my family happy - the Airbot App. Let me share my delightful journey with you.

Imagine a home where your chores are effortlessly managed, giving you more time to cherish moments with your loved ones. The Airbot App is designed for families like ours, who value cleanliness and convenience. 

Here's why I absolutely love the Airbot App:

    Effortless Control: With just a tap, I can control and monitor my Airbot devices from anywhere. It's like having a personal assistant for my home!

    Robotic Vacuum Cleaner Magic: Our Airbot robotic vacuum cleaner, paired with its intelligent dock station, has been a game-changer. The dock features a clean water tank, dirty water tank, and dust bag, allowing the robot to self-wash its mop cloth, empty its dust bin, and dry its mop cloth automatically. It's like having a self-sufficient cleaning buddy!

    Smart Scheduling: The app lets me set schedules for our robotic vacuum cleaner. I can plan different cleaning tasks for specific times, ensuring our home is always in top shape without lifting a finger.

    Stay Updated: The app keeps us informed with the latest device updates, ensuring our Airbot appliances are always running at their best.

    Family Sharing: Sharing is caring! The Airbot App allows me to share access and control of our devices with my family and friends. It's wonderful knowing everyone can pitch in, making home management a collective effort.

In a world where time is precious, the Airbot App has become an indispensable part of our home. It has transformed the way we manage our household, giving us more time to enjoy the little moments that matter most.

Download the Airbot App today and experience the joy of smart living. Let’s make home life easier and more enjoyable, one smart device at a time!

title: TABbot
description:
TAB robot is a humanistic brand that always cares about every user. You can complete the functional operation of the robot through the APP, and remotely check the running status, saving worry and trouble, and better serving our life.

【 Powerful remote control ability 】
When you complete the binding of the product, as long as your mobile phone has the network, you can control it through the mobile phone, and you can clearly understand the running track and completion of the robot by viewing the map; Through map editing, it is also possible to delimit voting areas and prohibited areas.
【 Multiple operation mode selection 】
The robot has a variety of cleaning modes, you can choose the mode that suits you through the APP: such as the size of suction, the amount of mop water and so on;
【OTA】
We will also continue to upgrade products through OTA to bring you new experiences.

description: This is a Bluetooth controller for pool cleaning robot. It can control the cleaning robot to automatically clean the pool in 4 modes, or manually control the cleaning robot to clean the designated places in the pool. Also, you can make an appointment to start the cleaning robot automatically and clean the pool.

title: Zigma
description:
Connecting to the Zigma APP you can unlock the following functions.
Device information: You can display information about device functions, working status, fault exceptions, consumables life, etc. 
House map: By building a floor cleaning house map, you can personalize the name, zone, and set the rooms and areas you want to clean.
Suction power level: Four levels of suction power can be switched to personalize the level you need according to the dirtiness of the area you are cleaning.
Appointment cleaning: You can personalize the time and number of times the machine works according to your living habits and cleaning needs.
Firmware upgrade: With OTA technology, you can constantly upgrade the firmware version of your robot to experience smarter continuous improvement.

title: BOBOT LIFE
description:
With [Personalized cleaning settings], you can configure different cleaning plans for your family,and meet your personalized cleaning requirements in different scenarios. 
Under [Three cleaning modes], you can adjust the cleaning frequence, suction power, and mop humidity, and set different combinations to meet your cleaning requirements. 
Through [Mop cleaning], you can command BOBOT to return to the station to clean mop based on floor condition. After that, BOBOT will continue the uncompleted cleaning task. 
[Restricted Zone/Virtual Wall] is used to set restricted zones/virtual walls.
BOBOT will only go to permitted places based on your instructions, such as plush carpet area and children’s toy area. 
[Division Edit] enables area division, combination, and renaming, and you can divide the cleaning space as you like. 
Through [Sharing management], you can share one BOBOT to your family members through the app,
and realize joint control among family members. In addition, you can manage the sharing members in the app. 
Please contact us through the following methods. 
Website:bobot-israel.com
Tel.: +972-51-2468002

• Adjust the volume of water used
for mopping.
• Activate or deactivate the
automatic self-cleaning function.
• See history

returned to the docking station.

title: RoboKit
description:
We have released the RoboKit mobile application with which you can remotely control Kitfort robots.
On the first launch of the application, select a robot and connect it.
After connecting, you can control the robot while away from home. For example, on leaving work, go to the application and click on the Start button. You will come home to a nice clean floor.
To avoid having to press a button every time you can set a cleaning schedule for the whole week.
From the RoboKit application, you can not only start cleaning, but also change cleaning modes and instruct the robot to charge itself.
While moving the robot draws a cleaning map and displays it in the mobile application.
The RoboKit mobile app team is constantly working on improving features and functionality of the product.
In the near future we will launch more robots that can be controlled from the application and provide even more opportunities for users of our smart devices.
If you have any questions or suggestions, please write to us at info@kitfort.ru
Official website: https://kirfort.ru/

title: SUBLUE ROBOT
description:
SUBLUE ROBOT App is a mobile App that connects to SUBLUE intelligent swimming pool cleaning robot products and supports the designated swimming pool cleaning robot products of SUBLUE. You can complete the function operations of the robot through the App and view more cleaning map information which is unavailable to traditional pool cleaning robots.

After connecting to SUBLUE ROBOT App, you can easily unlock more functions:
	Keep track of the cleaning process at any time and get the cleaning path
	Remotely reserve cleaning in real time, allowing for swimming pool cleaning even when you are not at home
	Remotely control cleaning with your mobile phone, clean wherever it is dirty
	Display the cleaning data in real time and share the cleaning log by one click
	Freely set the cleaning mode, cover the bottom, walls and waterline of the swimming pool
	Remotely upgrade the robot firmware (OTA upgrade), experience the cutting-edge features as using a new machine every year
	SUBLUE Mall, more good products, more discounts

Official Website: www.sublue.com

title: NemH2O
description:
NEMH2O is an innovative robot, developed by the creators of Ambrogio Robot, in order to have a completely automatic pool cleaner.

NEMH2O is autonomous 365 days a year: with NEMH20 you don’t need to clean the pool or resort to a winter cover.

NEMH2O requires no power cords and can also be used without a filter (using the existing filters in each pool), he gets recharged through induction directly by itself in the water and programmed via bluetooth (software upgradeable via APP).

title: Sunseeker Robot
description:
This App is a mobile terminal application for the smart lawn mower and needs to be used with the smart lawn mower.

By binding the App and the smart lawn mower, you can use the following functions:
1. You can create robot working areas, restricted areas, channels, etc. by remotely controlling the smart lawn mower via Bluetooth.
2. You can remote control the smart lawn mower for work and recharging.
3. You can edit created maps, manage work areas, create safe areas and virtual restricted areas, etc.
4. You can check the working status of the smart lawn mower, robot power, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connection status, etc. in real time.
5. You can schedule the smart lawn mower and reserve the robot working time.

title: Automower Connect
description:
The official Husqvarna Automower® Connect app allows you to take full control of your Husqvarna robotic lawnmower. The app provides two modes of connectivity depending on model; Automower® Connect for long-range connectivity using cellular communication, and Automower® Connect@Home for short-range connectivity using Bluetooth. Husqvarna Automower® Connect app provides the following main capabilities:

Status and control
•	Receive the current status of the mower.
•	Receive push notifications if the mower is stopped or is brought outside the installation.
•	Send Start, Pause and Park commands to the mower.

Configure and install
•	Have the mower’s complete menu system on your mobile device.
•	View and change the mower settings, e.g. timers and cutting height.
•	Take advantage of the high resolution and color display on your mobile device to enhance the interaction with the mower.

Security (applicable for Husqvarna Automower® Connect long-range connectivity)
•	Track your mower’s GPS position in real time.
•	Receive push notification alarm in the event of theft.

title: NEXMOW
description:
Unlock business growth with NEXMOW! URSROBOT's cutting-edge robotic mower. Say goodbye to laborious mowing tasks and hello to enhanced efficiency. Whether solo or in a fleet, NEXMOW effortlessly handles expansive landscapes, freeing up your crew's time for impactful projects. Enjoy hassle-free operation with wire-free freedom, thanks to NEXMOW's boundary wire elimination. Plus, with satellite and 4G connectivity, achieve precise outdoor navigation with an unrivaled 2 cm accuracy, revolutionizing precision mowing.

NEXMOW key features include:

4G LTE & RTK Precision Remote Control
Professional-grade systematic mowing patterns boosts productivity.
Real-Time Remote Control with GPS tracking, productivity reports, and machine monitoring.
Cloud-Based Fleet Collaboration Management
Map large, complex fields or entire city parks with ease using our technology.
Deploy up to 10 mowers for 10X productivity, guided by AI for optimal patterns.
Automatic Safety Sensor
Multiple sensors enable obstacle avoidance, trigger alerts, and stop blades.
Security device tracks via GPS, alerts app on theft.

title: Navimow
description:
Segway Navimow is an advanced robotic mower that uses a virtual boundary, eliminating the need for complicated perimeter wiring. Easy to operate and manage, Navimow gives you more free time to do the things you love and an effortlessly impeccable lawn with every use. 
With the help of Navimow app, you can:
1. Easily install and activate the device by following the detailed tutorials.
2. Create a virtual working zone for your mower. Understand your lawn area and create a corresponding map. Just remote control the mower to set up the boundary, off-limit area, and channel. Even multiple lawn areas can be managed at your fingertip. 
3. Set the mowing schedule. You can either choose to use the recommended schedule auto-generated based on your preferences or select the mowing time by yourself. 
4. Monitor the mower at any time. You can check the mower status, mowing progress, remote control the mower to start or stop working whenever you want. 
5. Personalize features and settings. Features like the cutting height, work mode can be adjusted with just a few clicks. 

Should you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to send an Email to: support-navimow@rlm.segway.com
To know more about Navimow models and technical details, please visit our website: https://navimow.segway.com

title: U Mower
description:
U Mower APP is the official companion app for UBHOME Robotic Mower, designed to bring unprecedented convenience and intelligence to your lawn mowing experience.

Intelligent Map Creation: Quickly create a virtual map that includes work areas, no-go zones, and paths, allowing the Robotic mower to accurately grasp the layout of your yard.
Remote Control: Start or pause mowing tasks anytime, anywhere, and monitor progress in real-time to ensure tasks are completed efficiently.
Personalized Customization: Customize mowing height and speed according to the needs of different areas to meet your personalized needs.
Mowing Schedule Setting: Pre-set mowing plans, and the Robotic Mower will automatically execute mowing tasks according to the schedule.
Mowing task Recording: Keep detailed records of each mowing session, including time, task status, and more.
Remote Mowing: Control mowing through the APP, mow where you want, for more freedom.

U Mower —— Make mowing simple, smart, and reliable. Download now and enjoy the convenience of smart mowing.

title: Scythe Robotics
description:
Introducing the Scythe Robotics mobile app, the ultimate tool for managing your fleet of all-electric lawn mowers. With its intuitive design and advanced features, this app allows you to stay on top of your landscaping operations like never before.

Easily track the location and status of each robot in your fleet, thanks to the app's detailed map and real-time updates. Check battery levels, charging status, perimeters, and drive mode with just a few taps, and never worry about a robot running out of power during a job again.

The app's sleek design makes it easy to use, and the level of control it provides gives you complete confidence in your landscaping operations. And with its ability to monitor multiple robots at once, you can streamline your operations and increase efficiency like never before.

Scythe's mobile app is the ideal tool for managing your fleet of all-electric lawn mowers. With its advanced features, user-friendly design, and eco-friendly focus, it's the ultimate choice for any landscaping professional looking to take their M.52 operations to the next level.

title: Sunseeker Robot
description:
This App is a mobile terminal application for the smart lawn mower and needs to be used with the smart lawn mower.

By binding the App and the smart lawn mower, you can use the following functions:
1. You can create robot working areas, restricted areas, channels, etc. by remotely controlling the smart lawn mower via Bluetooth.
2. You can remote control the smart lawn mower for work and recharging.
3. You can edit created maps, manage work areas, create safe areas and virtual restricted areas, etc.
4. You can check the working status of the smart lawn mower, robot power, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connection status, etc. in real time.
5. You can schedule the smart lawn mower and reserve the robot working time.

title: Rugged Robot
description:
Please note: Rugged Robot Floor Robot is compatible with any Android device with version 5.0(Lollipop) or higher 

Download the app to control Rugged Robot, the latest addition to the TTS floor robot family. The app enables you to write an algorithm, send it and then Rugged Robot will follow your instructions. There are numerous features, which make writing algorithms both fun and educational.
 
Use step-by-step for beginners
	•	Get to grips with directional control with step-by-step commands
Move onto basic programming 
	•	Create and debug algorithms 

Use explore mode to develop algorithms:
	•	Drag and drop programming. Just drag your instructions into the left hand bar to save
	•	Include repeats to make things even more fun
	•	Program 45 degree turns
	•	Control the 3 speed settings
	•	Turn obstacle avoidance on/off 


Children can also record themselves saying a command and can assign it to a button on Rugged Robot. As the algorithm progresses, they will hear themselves giving the instructions.
 
Notes:
Please note to control a Rugged Robot floor robot your device must have Bluetooth.

title: Powerplus Mower POWDPG6010
description:
Mow your lawn without lifting a finger! Well… maybe one. With the official Powerplus app, you can easily control your robot mower from a distance. You can even add multiple mowers to the app. Simply connect via Wi-Fi and enjoy the different functions the app has to offer. 

No more weekends wasted mowing your lawn. With this app, you can determine your lawn’s different zones and set a mowing schedule that works for you and your garden. You don’t even have to be near the robot mower to keep an eye on it. The app lets you check the battery status and will let you know when the mower is in trouble through push notifications. After all that hard work, the mower will either automatically return home or you can call it back to the charging station using the app.

From the comfort of your deck chair or sofa, you can:
* Set a mowing schedule
* Call your mower back to its charging station
* Specify one or multiple mowing zones
* Turn the rain sensor on or off
* Keep an eye on your mower thanks to the push notifications
* Check the battery status

title: Rainbow for DJI Drones
description:
Latest support Mini 2,  Air 2s,  Mini SE,  Air 2,  mavic Mini drone support. 

Mini 3 and Mini 3 pro,  Mavic 3e/3t,  m30 you can try the follow:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rainbow.drone.v5 

The best app to unlock all potential of your DJI drone (Phantom / Inspire / Spark series). You can film better with your DJI drone by Rainbow. 

Compatible with DJI Mavic 2 Zoom/Pro, Mavic Air/Pro/Mini, Phantom 4 Normal/Advanced/Pro/ProV2, Phantom 3 Standard/4K/Advanced/Professional, Inspire 1 X3/Z3/Pro/RAW, Inspire 2, Spark

We will keep upgrading rainbow, so we would like to hear from you. Any suggestions are welcomed, please contact us via email:  rainbow.feedback@hotmail.com


Feature Highlights:

* Support  Waypoint/Obit/Follow me for Mavic Mini

* Incredible stability, far better than DJI Go. Smooth Operation with no lag.

* Advanced Waypoint support, you can custom your own auto fly. The number of waypoints is up to 99 waypoints.

* Support Panorama Shooting

* FPV mode support.

* Save and load local waypoint mission.

* Support camera pointing within waypoint mode.

* Track mode supported. Track object and Orbit around it or have the aircraft autonomously follow the subject just like using DJI GO.

* Rich camera and aircraft settings. Control everything of your drone.

* More fly mode and feature is coming.

* Course Lock / Home Lock support.


Helper:

* Waypoint management: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ajT9T6J2jWk

* Flying a mission: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1L_jYuGR-bc

Rainbow has subscription plan, you can use it 2 time for free, after that you can subscribe rainbow for future usage.

title: UgCS for DJI
descriptionHTML:
The UgCS for DJI app is designed to establish a connection between the DJI drone and the UgCS desktop to upload and carry out previously planned automatic AreaScan, Photogrammetry, Vertical (Facade) scan, Corridor Mapping and other drone survey mission. UgCS for DJI can also be used as a stand-alone application to manually fly a DJI drone and capture photos or videos.

Compatible with DJI’s:
- M600 / M600 PRO
- M300
- M200, M200 v2 series, M210, M210RTK
- M100
- Mavic Pro, Mavic 2 Pro/Enterprise/Zoom
- A3
- N3
- Inspire 2
- Inspire 1
- Phantom 4
- Phantom 4 PRO series
- Phantom 4 PRO V2.0
- Phantom 4 ADV (will be detected as the profile of Phantom 4 PRO)
- Phantom 3 (all editions)
- Spark.

UgCS for DJI features:
- Establish connection with UgCS desktop enabling full access to features to plan, control and fly drone missions;
- Upload planned and calculated missions from UgCS desktop to DJI drone;
- Start uploaded mission manually or in auto-mode;
- Manual flight mode;
- Flight simulator;
- Live HD camera view;
- Camera view stream to UgCS Desktop;
- Manage camera settings and controls (gimbal pitch and yaw);
- Capture photos and videos;
- Reset home position;
- Command vehicle to return to the home position;
- Check telemetry data;
- Supports metric and imperial units.

Requires: UgCS desktop
Download the latest version of UgCS: https://ugcs.com/download

About UgCS desktop
UgCS is a complete platform to plan and fly drone survey missions. Automated drone mission planning, built-in photogrammetry, facade scan, and geotagging tools, map customization and battery exchange option for long routes make UgCS an effective solution for a wide range of applications.

Control your drones with UgCS https://ugcs.com
summary: App to establish a connection between DJI drone and UgCS desktop ground station

title: DroneMagic
description:
The DroneMagic Autonomous Flight Solution

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc0jPPUJCDjViXmzQxK54uA/

DroneMagic is an innovative and comprehensive autonomous drone operating application to support unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) drone missions using DJI commercial drones including the Mavic, Phantom, Inspire and Matrice series. Each flight includes tools for planning, mission-based flight, data capture and post-flight analysis.  DroneMagic is ideal for commercial implementations for roof inspections, real estate, agriculture, golf courses and more.
The software’s intuitive Android-based Google Maps interface is used to easily and quickly create single, multi-point and orthomosaic mapping mission plans. The DroneMagic App includes four (4) mission operating modes: 
1. Waypoint Missions – Designed with safe takeoff and return home features, Waypoint pilotless flights are configurable to any number of pre-selected map locations that includes named waypoints to optimize flight data for post-mission analysis. 
2. NEW Mapping Missions with post-flight orthomosaic map rendering - DroneMagic includes an innovative tool to rapidly create a mapping flight grid with pre-calculated path overlap.  Mapping missions generate high-res 2D orthomosaic maps, 3D models, thermal maps and surface elevation graphics.  Post-flight photo-based ortho processing is included.  
3. Hotpoint Missions – Hotpoint flights navigate a circumference around a pre-specified geographical target. They are automated, line of sight missions that occur within remote controller range.   
4. QuickPoint Missions – QuickPoint flights are fully autonomous for beyond visual line of sight missions that have FAA Part 107 approval.  QuickPoint allows for a single point, rapid set-up, fully autonomous Hotpoint aerial drone mission (see above) 

DroneMagic Operating Features
Google Maps interface - Visualize flight plans on Google Maps with automatic screenshot capture for each mission. A hybrid integration provides satellite view with street details to optimize waypoint placement. 
Mapping - Rapidly auto-create a mapping-mission grid overlay by touching the Google Maps interface to create a four-point boundary. DroneMagic will auto-fill the mapping route based on pre-selected flight parameters.
Safety - Drone damage and loss prevention features are standard through a safe height collision and obstacle avoidance system with an optimized safe go-home height.  DroneMagic will pre-detect a safe home location before allowing takeoff.
Battery Management - Battery sensors are auto-configured based on flight plan with ability to check drone battery lifetime left.  
Data Management - Post-mission photo data transfer includes a wireless transfer option of photos from drone to a tablet’s storage and/or a hard-wired transfer to any device with USB connectivity. Storage-ready flight logs, imagery, photos, video, and uploaded files.  Google Drive storage integration with Waypoint Missions.  
Web Integration - Auto-update a website with mission media content. System will compress photos into a web-optimized format with upload to Google Drive storage.  
Video -  A satellite-detected home waypoint is automatically set.  Stream live via YouTube (applies to LOS flights)
Ortho Processing - Export and integrate with DroneMagic mapping software to generate orthomosaics, digital surface models, NDVI maps, plant health graphics and contour maps.  

Warranty Notification – 
THE DRONEMAGIC SOFTWARE APPLICATION IS PROVIDED “AS IS”, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANT-ABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
