title: Go Fly Drone Remote Controller
description: Elevate your drone uav or flycam experience with Go Fly Drone Remote Controller, the ultimate drone app designed to empower your UAV performance. Support 40+ UAV drone models (Android Mobile SDK 5.10) Go 4 is the most trusted drone app for DJI 3 new models such as: - 3 Pro / Mavic 3 / Mavic 3 Pro / Mini 3, RC N1, RC Plus / Pro, Mavic 3M, Mavic 3T - Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Smart Controller Enterprise, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Phantom 3 professional, O3 - Matrice 30 Series, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus or Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice - Zenmuse H20 Series / H30 Series, Zenmuse P1 / L1 / L2, Inspire 3 DRONE REMOTE CONTROLLER FEATURES Offers intuitive drone controller, flight simulator, powerful fpv drone camera and seamless connectivity to unlock the full potential of your gofly drone / drone uav... through drone app: - Waypoint: Regardless of your skill level, Smart Flight for Fly Drone provides the most user-friendly yet robust tool for creating waypoint missions (compatible with Phantom series drones). - Panorama: Effortlessly capture 360-degree horizontal and vertical panoramas by drone camera. - Focus mode: Go Fly for simplifies control by managing the drone's yaw axis and gimbal, allowing you to focus on horizontal movements. - Smart Flight modes: Easy to remote control drone with flight modes to fly a drone with drone GPS navigation, compatible with all drone models, these modes enhance your drone flight experience. - On-screen Exposure graph: Monitor exposure levels with the on-screen exposure graph for precise control over your drone camera settings. - User-friendly interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface and drone camera view from phone for seamless drone control and navigation. - Expansive Drone camera view: Take control of your shots with customizable camera settings, allowing you to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance for the perfect capture - Simple exporting of images & videos: Easily save and transfer your high-resolution photos and videos directly to your phone for quick access and sharing. - Tutorials: Access tutorials to assist you in getting started & how to gofly drone uav & become pilot with ease, optimize UAV performance *Compatible with almost model with Android Mobile SDK 5.10: Mini 3 Pro, RC Plus, Smart Controller Enterprise, Mini 3, RC N1, RC Pro, Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Mavic 3M, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice, Zenmuse H20 Series, Zenmuse H30 Series, Zenmuse P1, Zenmuse L1, Zenmuse L2, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus), Matrice 300 RTK (Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 30 Series, Zenmuse H30 With Mavic models, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down. DISCLAIMER: This app is neither an official DJI product nor affiliated with the DJI company.
descriptionHTML:
Elevate your drone uav or flycam experience with Go Fly Drone Remote Controller, the ultimate drone app designed to empower your UAV performance.

Support 40+ UAV drone models (Android Mobile SDK 5.10)
Go 4 is the most trusted drone app for DJI 3 new models such as:
- 3 Pro / Mavic 3 / Mavic 3 Pro / Mini 3, RC N1, RC Plus / Pro, Mavic 3M, Mavic 3T
- Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Smart Controller Enterprise, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Phantom 3 professional, O3
- Matrice 30 Series, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus or Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice
- Zenmuse H20 Series / H30 Series, Zenmuse P1 / L1 / L2, Inspire 3

DRONE REMOTE CONTROLLER FEATURES
Offers intuitive drone controller, flight simulator, powerful fpv drone camera and seamless connectivity to unlock the full potential of your gofly drone / drone uav... through drone app:

- Waypoint: Regardless of your skill level, Smart Flight for Fly Drone provides the most user-friendly yet robust tool for creating waypoint missions (compatible with Phantom series drones).

- Panorama: Effortlessly capture 360-degree horizontal and vertical panoramas by drone camera.

- Focus mode: Go Fly for simplifies control by managing the drone's yaw axis and gimbal, allowing you to focus on horizontal movements.

- Smart Flight modes: Easy to remote control drone with flight modes to fly a drone with drone GPS navigation, compatible with all drone models, these modes enhance your drone flight experience.

- On-screen Exposure graph: Monitor exposure levels with the on-screen exposure graph for precise control over your drone camera settings.

- User-friendly interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface and drone camera view from phone for seamless drone control and navigation.

- Expansive Drone camera view: Take control of your shots with customizable camera settings, allowing you to fine-tune ISO, shutter speed, and white balance for the perfect capture

- Simple exporting of images & videos: Easily save and transfer your high-resolution photos and videos directly to your phone for quick access and sharing.

- Tutorials: Access tutorials to assist you in getting started & how to gofly drone uav & become pilot with ease, optimize UAV performance

*Compatible with almost model with Android Mobile SDK 5.10: Mini 3 Pro, RC Plus, Smart Controller Enterprise, Mini 3, RC N1, RC Pro, Mavic 3 Enterprise Series, Mavic 3M, Pilot 2 App, Assistant 2, Matrice 350 RTK, D-RTK 2 Mobile Station for Matrice, Zenmuse H20 Series, Zenmuse H30 Series, Zenmuse P1, Zenmuse L1, Zenmuse L2, Matrice 300 RTK (RC Plus), Matrice 300 RTK (Smart Controller Ent), Matrice 30 Series, Zenmuse H30

With Mavic models, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down.

DISCLAIMER:
This app is neither an official DJI product nor affiliated with the DJI company.
summary: Drone remote controller: Drone camera UAV fly app, Fly Go 4 Mavic Mini Air drone

title: Go Fly Drone Remote Controller
description:
Easily fly your drone with Fly Drone Remote Controller app - Drone mobile app for remote control drone from your phone, compatible with a wide range of drones model, flycam, UAV... 

Drone Controller app offers intuitive features like drone mapping with airmap, drone panorama shooting with drone camera view from phone, drone navigation model. Elevate your drone flight experience with our remote controll drone app. Easy to control a drone flight and take great drone footage for your journey

*DRONE REMOTE CONTROLLER FEATURES:

- Drone Panorama Photography: Capture panoramic images and videos with your drone camera view on your phone. Take great drone footage to enhance your journey.

- UAV Forecast: Forecast weather for drone, stay updated on current weather conditions with real-time temperature, wind speed, and precipitation levels, ensuring safe and optimal flying conditions for your drone, flycam, or UAV.

- Drone No-Fly Zone Map: Receive instant alerts and guidance to avoid restricted areas with the drone fly zone map. Stay informed about no-fly zones near airports, military bases, and other sensitive locations, ensuring compliance and safety.

- Smart Flight Modes: Easy to remote control drone with intelligent flight modes to fly a drone with drone GPS navigation, compatible with all drone models, these modes enhance your drone flight experience.

- Drone Footage Export: Transfer your drone data media to your device for quick sharing and editing. Support for high-quality file formats: JPG, GeoTIFF, DXF/SHP, PDF, MOV, 4K, MP4,...

- Find My Drone: Utilize Drone GPS tracker to locate your drone in case of loss or emergency situations, get safe for your flight of drone.

- Home Point: Set and save a designated location as the home point for your drone. In the event of signal loss or low battery, your drone will automatically return to this point for a safe landing.

- Intuitive User Interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface and drone camera view from phone for seamless drone control and navigation.

- On-Screen Exposure Graph: Monitor exposure levels with the on-screen exposure graph for precise control over your drone's camera settings.

- Drone Gimbal Direction Adjustment: Fine-tune the direction of your drone's gimbal for optimal camera positioning and stability.

-  Tutorials - How to fly drones for beginners: Access tutorials for beginners to get how to fly drone, flycam, or UAV piloting with ease. Experience the next level of drone flight controller and exploration with the ""Fly Drone Remote Controller"" app.

Compatible with drone models/flycam/uav

Note: Fly Drone Remote Controller is not an official drone app; it supports drone models for Android phones. If you have any issues, please contact: support@goflydrone.app

Lifetime: $39.99

title: Go Fly Drone Remote Controller
description:
Take your drone flying experience to new heights with Go Fly Controller Drone Remote, the advanced mobile app designed to make drone control smarter, safer, and more intuitive. Compatible with over 50 drone models, Go Fly Controller Drone Remote brings you the tools you need to explore the skies, capture stunning footage, and fly with confidence.

With an array of intelligent features and seamless compatibility, Go Fly Controller Drone Remote makes it easy for both beginners and experts to pilot drones with precision and ease.

** Compatible Devices:
- Matrice 200, 210, 200 V2, 210 V2 
- Matrice 210,  300, 350 RTK 
- Matrice 600 & Matrice 600 Pro, RTK and Ronin MX
- Matrice 100 with X3, X5 & X5R
- DJI Air2S, Mini2, Mini SE, X-Port, SkyPort, SkyPort V2, Smart Controller
- Mavic Air 2, Mini, 2 Enterprise, 2 Enterprise Dual, 2 Enterprise Advanced,  2 Pro, 2 Zoom, Pro, Air
- Phantom 4, 4 Pro, 4 Advanced, 4 Pro V2.0, P4 Multispectral, 4 RTK
- Phantom 3 Standard, Advanced, 4K & Professional
- Inspire 2, Inspire 1, Inspire 1 Pro & Inspire 1 RAW
- Spark

**Key Features:
Waypoint Flight Planning: Customize your drone’s flight path by setting waypoints for smooth, pre-planned routes. Ideal for professional aerial photography, surveying, and more.

Panorama and Spherical Capture: Create breathtaking 360° panoramic shots with a simple tap, delivering seamless horizontal and vertical panoramas.

Real-Time Weather Forecasting: Stay updated with UAV weather forecasts, including wind speed, temperature, and precipitation, ensuring safe and optimal flying conditions.

No-Fly Zone Alerts: Instantly receive alerts on restricted airspaces, helping you avoid no-fly zones such as airports and military areas.

Smart Flight Modes: Take advantage of intelligent flight modes for automated flight maneuvers. Perfect for capturing cinematic shots without needing advanced piloting skills.

Find My Drone: Track your drone’s GPS location if it’s lost, making recovery stress-free and safe.

Media Export and File Sharing: Easily export photos and videos in high-quality formats like MP4, JPG, and 4K resolution. Seamless sharing and editing capabilities.

Home Point Setting: Set a designated home point for a safe return if the battery is low or the connection is lost.

Gimbal and Exposure Controls: Fine-tune your drone’s gimbal and exposure settings directly from your phone for professional-quality photos and videos.

Flight Tutorials: New to flying? Access comprehensive tutorials for beginners and learn essential drone flying skills step-by-step.

Note: Fly Drone Remote Controller is not an official drone app; it supports drone models for Android phones.
We are constantly developing and upgrading our products, so your reviews are very valuable. Hope to receive your feedback or support through: support@digitalcarkeyllc.com

Terms of Service: https://digitalcarkeyllc.com/terms-of-service
Privacy: https://digitalcarkeyllc.com/privacy-policy

title: Rainbow for DJI Mini3/Mini4
description:
Support DJI Mini4Pro/Mini3/Mini3 Pro, M30, M4T/M4E Mavic 3E/3T, M300 and other industrial models.
.
App to unleash the full potential of your DJI drone (Phantom/Inspiration/Spark series), you can make your DJI drone shoot better with Rainbow.

function points:

* Stable, smooth operation, no lag
* Waypoint support, you can customize your own automatic flight, support mission continuation, save, restore, specify the starting navigation point of the flight, support navigation point actions (shooting, steering, gimbal adjustment, stop, video recording).
* Support panorama shooting
* Support orthophoto shooting, missions can be saved, continued flight, timed, isometric, hovering multiple shooting modes.
* Support aerial belt shooting, suitable for orthophotos in rivers, roads and other belt states
* Support oblique photography, cross oblique, surround oblique and other modeling shooting
* Support stereo surround 3D shooting of a single building
* Support Kml and Kml multi-region import.
* Support Shp import

title: Dronetag
description:
With Dronetag, all drones fly safe & compliant. Our app helps everyone to receive and read drone identification data and offers a wide range of professional features to owners of Dronetag remote identification devices. We create a world where all drones can access airspace without the need to worry about accidents.

Dronetag Mini and Dronetag Beacon are add-on devices for remote identification designed and manufactured by us. They can be attached to any drone, making it digitally visible via Remote ID standards to all air traffic participants. 

- Dronetag Mini - 
Weighs 32 grams, offers up to 14-hour battery life, and supports both Direct & Network Remote ID technologies (DRI & NRI) via Bluetooth and LTE.

- Dronetag Beacon -
Weighs only 16 grams, offers up to 16-hour battery life, and supports Direct Remote ID technology (DRI only) via Bluetooth broadcasting.

Connect your device to the Dronetag app and enjoy the following features:
- Airspace scanner displaying all participants with Remote ID (available even without Dronetag device)
- Remote identification for your drone compliant with EU & US regulations
- Option to add and manage an unlimited number of unmanned aircraft
- Map of restricted zones such as airports within the whole EU & US
- Flight planning, including the time and altitude
- Flight tracker with a real-time position on the map and notifications
- Journal feature to save and export flight data of all your drones
- Full-text search: locations, restricted zones, aircraft, and Dronetag devices

Connect with the Dronetag team
Let’s chat about drones, flying, and tech. Send us your feedback or questions to: support@dronetag.cz

title: DRONERESPONDERS
description:
DRONERESPONDERS is a non-profit initiative dedicated to bringing together first responders, emergency managers, and search & rescue specialists under a unified organization. Its mission is to facilitate learning, training, and testing of UAS technologies, empowering public safety professionals to maximize drone operations in critical situations.

The program is led by Chief Charles Werner (ret.), who serves as the director. DRONERESPONDERS operates as an official 501(c)(3) non-profit under AIRT, Inc.'s Drones for Good initiative, advancing the responsible and effective use of drone technology for public safety.

title: GoDrone
description:
The GoDrone app, provided by LVNL and Altitude Angel in partnership, supports recreational drone flying by letting you know where and how you can fly your drone.
 
Please note that GoDrone app only provides airspace information for the Netherlands. 

GoDrone provides location-based information on areas of airspace to avoid or in which extreme caution should be exercised, as well as on ground hazards that may pose safety, security or privacy risks. 
This app will help you to abide by those rules, providing a tool to assist you in enjoying flying your drone whilst protecting your safety and the safety of other airspace users.
 
Features
View areas of controlled airspace, such as airfields and airports, where flying a drone could be hazardous or prohibited.
View ground hazards, such as schools, overhead power lines and sports venues, flying close to which may raise security, privacy or safety concerns and could breach NL rules on drone flying.

title: Drone Tracker
description:
Drone Tracker is an app used for vision-based object tracking for DJI drones. The app allows you to perform visual tracking in real time using drone’s primary camera as the drone autonomously flies following the tracked object. The app allows you to view the video stream from the drone’s primary camera during the flight operation with an overlay showing the tracked object.

Drone Tracker app is used with DJI drones and requires a DJ RC controller to be connected to the device. Following DJI drones are supported:

1.	Matrice 350 RTK
2.	Matrice 300 RTK
3.	DJI Mini 3
4.	DJI Mini 3 Pro
5.	DJI Mavic 3M
6.	DJI Mavic 3 Enterprise Series
7.	Matrice 30 Series

The app was developed by DeepMAV.ai.

The app allows you to safely take off, land and return to takeoff location by using the flight control panel on the bottom.

Tracking

To perform a tracking flight, first ensure the drone is powered on and connected to the RC. Also ensure the RC is powered on and the device is connected to the RC via the USB cable. You can check if the drone connection is successful by previewing the camera video by pressing the camera button in the app.

When the camera video preview panel is visible, tap anywhere inside the camera panel to select the object to track. The app will show a white rectangle overlay over the camera preview panel. Confirm you wish to start tracking in the popup dialog and the drone will start the tracking operation.

While the drone is in tracking mode, the button in the top left corner shows Tracking On. Pressing that button allows you to stop tracking.

Tapping anywhere inside the camera preview panel again allows you to select a different object to track. You can do this even while tracking is in progress.

While tracking is on, the video preview panel shows the live drone camera video with an overlay showing the location of the tracked objects in the frame.

When the drone is tracking, after takeoff, you can enable autonomous flight by pressing the Fly button in the bottom center panel. The drone will autonomously yaw to follow the tracked object and fly towards it if the object moves further away. Stopping autonomous flight will make the drone hover in place.

Simulator Mode

Drone Tracker app allows you to test your drone flight in simulator mode. Simply start the app, turn on your drone, make sure the RC is connected to the drone, and connect the device to the RC. Pressing the Sim On/Off button switches between simulator and normal mode. When the simulator is turned on, the button will show the Sim On status.

In simulator mode, the drone will perform takeoff, landing, and return to home functions, as if it was truly flying. You can use the control sticks on the RC to fly the drone manually in simulator mode. The map will display the drone’s simulated location. All other functions of the app are enabled including video preview and tracking. Note that the video preview shows the actual live feed from the drone’s primary camera and is not simulated.

No account creation or login required. Simply start the app and start flying.

Make sure to fly responsibly and obey your local drone regulations.

You can check if the drone connection is successful by previewing the camera video by pressing the camera button in the app.

When the camera video preview panel is visible, tap anywhere inside the camera panel to select the object to track. The app will show a white rectangle overlay over the camera preview panel. Confirm you wish to start tracking in the popup dialog and the drone will start the tracking operation.

While the drone is in tracking mode, the button in the top left corner shows Tracking On. Pressing that button allows you to stop tracking.

Tapping anywhere inside the camera preview panel again allows you to select a different object to track. You can do this even while tracking is in progress.

While tracking is on, the video preview panel shows the live drone camera video with an overlay showing the location of the tracked objects in the frame.

When the drone is tracking, after takeoff, you can enable autonomous flight by pressing the Fly button in the bottom center panel. The drone will autonomously yaw to follow the tracked object and fly towards it if the object moves further away. Stopping autonomous flight will make the drone hover in place.

Simulator Mode

Drone Tracker app allows you to test your drone flight in simulator mode. Simply start the app, turn on your drone, make sure the RC is connected to the drone, and connect the device to the RC. Pressing the Sim On/Off button switches between simulator and normal mode. When the simulator is turned on, the button will show the Sim On status.

In simulator mode, the drone will perform takeoff, landing, and return to home functions, as if it was truly flying. You can use the control sticks on the RC to fly the drone manually in simulator mode. The map will display the drone’s simulated location. All other functions of the app are enabled including video preview and tracking. Note that the video preview shows the actual live feed from the drone’s primary camera and is not simulated.

No account creation or login required. Simply start the app and start flying.

Make sure to fly responsibly and obey your local drone regulations.
summary: Visual tracking autonomous flight for DJI drones

title: 360 Drone Booth
description:
Our 360 Drone Booth software is compatible with the DJI Mini 3 Pro drone and uses a mix of programmed paths control and sophisticated AI to optimize safe flying. Takeoff, circling, and landing all at the touch of a single button via the Android tablet. There are many customizations, such as radius, number of loops, and live gimbal adjustments, just to name a few. Live AI tracking helps ensure a safe take off, flying, and landing.

The drone is lightweight and safe, weighing only 8 ounces with the safety cage equipped!

DJI Ocusync allows for reliable connectivity with no need to worry about disconnections (tablet to drone connection does not use Wi-Fi). If something does happen during flight, the drone will hover in place. The emergency land button is always available, if you want to land the drone at any time during flight.

The equipment is super easy to transport and set up! All you need is the DJI drone, Android tablet, and the printable helipad (all of which can be easily contained in a small case).

Sharing is easy! We support the use of most existing 360 sharing platforms.

Future releases will contain different flight patterns!

title: AeroGCS GREEN
description:
AeroGCS GREEN 

A versatile agriculture spraying drone mission planning software 
Using AeroGCS GREEN , one can connect with Ardupilot based drones and create mission plans with few clicks to fly a spray mission.

With AeroGCS GREEN its also possible to add areas to be avoided while flying , also map a field ( plot) using various methods like using mobile device , using map , using drone itself.

AeroGCS GREEN lets you fly a mission and stop it in-between to refill the spray liquid and restart mission where it landed / passed.

AeroGCS GREEN is a companion app for AeroGCS KEA as it only focuses on agriculture spraying and workflows. AeroGCS GREEN lets you share spraying reports with anyone with clicks, also upload to AeroMegh cloud and also generate amazing business insights instantly.

title: Drone Autonomy
description:
Drone Autonomy is an app used for autonomous drone flights with Parrot Anafi drones. The app supports two modes of flight autonomy. In Position mode, you can control where the drone navigates by selecting locations on the map. In Area flight mode, you can define an area on the map and the drone navigates autonomously with the defined flight boundary. Drone Autonomy allows you to live stream the video feed from the drone’s primary camera to a streaming service such as YouTube over the internet.

Drone Autonomy app is used with Parrot drones and may be used with a Sky Controller or directly by connecting the device to the drone’s WiFi access point. Following Parrot Anafi drones are supported:

1.	Parrot Anafi AI
2.	Parrot Anafi 4K
3.	Parrot Anafi USA

The app was developed by DeepMAV.ai.

Perform automatic takeoff by pressing the Take Off button in the app. Upon takeoff, you can switch on autonomous flight by pressing the Fly button in the flight control panel.

Position Autonomy Mode

When in autonomous flight in Position mode, the drone will navigate to the defined target location while maintaining the chosen altitude above takeoff. Upon reaching the target location, the drone will hover in place. Simply tap on the map to define the target location for the drone. Pressing the Clear Target button removes the defined target and makes the drone hover in place.

Area Autonomy Mode

When in Area mode, tapping on the map allows you to define the vertices of the flight area within which the drone will fly. Pressing the Save Area button saves the defined flight area and displays it on the map. Pressing the Clear Area button removes the defined flight area. You may define a flight area of any polygonal shape.

When you activate the autonomous flight in Area mode by pressing the Fly button, the drone will start flying autonomously within the defined flight area, while maintaining the chosen altitude above takeoff. The drone will never leave the bounds of the defined flight area during the flight.

Deactivating the autonomous flight by pressing the Stop button will hold the drone in place. Autonomous flight may be resumed by pressing on the Fly button once again.

Automatic landing and return to home functions may be engaged by pressing the Land and Home buttons on the flight control panel.

No account creation or login required. Simply start the app and start flying.

Make sure to fly responsibly and obey your local drone regulations.

title: Drone Autonomy
description:
Drone Autonomy is an app used for autonomous drone flights with DJI drones. The app supports two modes of flight autonomy. In Position mode, you can control where the drone navigates by selecting locations on the map. In Area flight mode, you can define an area on the map and the drone navigates autonomously within the defined flight boundary. Drone Autonomy allows you to live stream the video feed from the drone’s primary camera to a streaming service such as YouTube over the internet.

Drone Autonomy app is used with DJI drones and requires a DJ RC controller to be connected to the device. Following DJI drones are supported:
1.	Matrice 350 RTK
2.	Matrice 300 RTK
3.	DJI Mini 3
4.	DJI Mini 3 Pro
5.	DJI Mavic 3M
6.	DJI Mavic 3 Enterprise Series
7.	Matrice 30 Series

The app was developed by DeepMAV.ai.

Perform automatic takeoff by pressing the Take Off button in the app. Upon takeoff, you can switch on autonomous flight by pressing the Fly button in the flight control panel.

Position Autonomy Mode

When in autonomous flight in Position mode, the drone will navigate to the defined target location while maintaining the chosen altitude above takeoff. Upon reaching the target location, the drone will hover in place. Simply tap on the map to define the target location for the drone. Pressing the Clear Target button removes the defined target and makes the drone hover in place.

Area Autonomy Mode

When in Area mode, tapping on the map allows you to define the vertices of the flight area within which the drone will fly. Pressing the Save Area button saves the defined flight area and displays it on the map. Pressing the Clear Area button removes the defined flight area. You may define a flight area of any polygonal shape.

When you activate the autonomous flight in Area mode by pressing the Fly button, the drone will start flying autonomously within the defined flight area, while maintaining the chosen altitude above takeoff. The drone will never leave the bounds of the defined flight area during the flight.

Deactivating the autonomous flight by pressing the Stop button will hold the drone in place. Autonomous flight may be resumed by pressing on the Fly button once again.

Automatic landing and return to home functions may be engaged by pressing the Land and Home buttons on the flight control panel.

Live Streaming

Drone Autonomy app allows you to live stream the video feed from the drone’s primary camera to a streaming service such as YouTube. The live streaming requires that the device is connected to the internet or a network where the streaming service can be reached.

In order to live stream the drone video, first enable the camera view by pressing the Camera button. Once the camera view is visible, pressing the Live Stream button allows you to select the URL of the streaming service you wish to stream to and start the stream.

While live streaming is active, the Live Stream button will flash red. Turning off live streaming can be done by pressing the flashing Live Stream button.

Simulator Mode

Drone Autonomy app allows you to test your drone flight in simulator mode. Simply start the app, turn on your drone, make sure the RC is connected to the drone, and connect the device to the RC. Pressing the Sim On/Off button switches between simulator and normal mode. When the simulator is turned on, the button will show the Sim On status.

In simulator mode, the drone will perform takeoff, autonomous flight, landing, or return to home functions, as if it was truly flying. The map will display the drone’s simulated location. All other functions of the app are enabled including Position and Area mode and live streaming.

No account creation or login required. Simply start the app and start flying.

Make sure to fly responsibly and obey your local drone regulations.

Experience extended flight time and explore the skies for longer with the Contixo 4K Aerial Drone. Its powerful battery allows for prolonged flights, giving you ample time to capture amazing aerial shots and explore new horizons.

title: Go Fly Drone Camera Controller
description:
Explore the skies like never before with Go Fly - the ultimate flight companion for your drone. Unlock the full potential of your aerial adventures with our top-rated app.

Go Fly stands as the premier choice for drone enthusiasts, providing unparalleled support for a range of drone models. Our dedication to continuous improvement ensures that we're always by your side, ready to elevate your flying experience.

Key Features:
+ Waypoint Missions: Seamlessly plan your flight path with our intuitive waypoint mission tool, designed for both novice pilots and seasoned pros alike.
+ Panorama Capture: Effortlessly capture stunning 360-degree panoramas, both horizontally and vertically.
+ Focus Mode: Take precise control of your drone's yaw axis and gimbal, allowing you to focus solely on capturing the perfect shot.

And much more, including:
+ Smart Flight Modes
+ Intuitive User Interface and Expansive Camera View
+ Effortless Image and Video Export to iPhone
+ On-Screen Exposure Graph
+ Gimbal Direction Adjustment
+ Comprehensive Flight Tutorials for Beginners

For *Mavic users, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down (Mavic Air2S: double tap is C2, 1-tap is C1)

We are constantly developing and upgrading our products, so your reviews are very valuable. Hope to receive your feedback or support through: support@smartwidgetlabs.com

Terms of Use: https://smartwidgetlabs.com/terms-of-use/
Disclaimer: We are not an official app, but a support app

title: Gravitii
description:
This app supports Gravitii drones to meet the needs of aerial photography.

Experience the combination of technology and life, find the inspiration, enjoy the enjoyment at high altitude, travel around the world, record the good times!

Functions:
1. FPV live sharing, photo taking or recording videos 
2. Adjust the gimbal angle, parameter of camera
3. One key share to social media
4. Waypoint，route planning
5. One key take off/land, one key return
6. Display flight speed, GPS, battery life
7. One key switch to altitude, GPS,Follow, etc
8. Beginners’ mode

title: Drone Amplified
description:
Beta Version: Try this out for free!

WE WANT YOUR FEEDBACK
Let us know what features you want, so we can make this app amplify your drone operations.

Features:
• Download elevation maps for terrain-aware flight
• Download satellite maps to fly without an internet connection.
• Touch the map to place waypoints, then upload them to the drone.
• Take photos and shoot video
• Adjust camera exposure, focus, digital zoom, and gimbal orientation
• View diagnostic information about the drone, and calibrate the compass.
• In-app manual.
• Overlay KMZ, KML, and Georeferenced PDF files on the map.
• And more!

Compatible with:
Inspire 1, Pro, Raw
Inspire 2
Matrice 100
Matrice 600, Pro
Phantom 3 Standard, 4K, Professional, Advanced
Phantom 4, Pro, Advanced
Mavic Air, Pro
Mavic 2 Pro, Zoom

Manual:
http://droneamplified.com/app/AppManual.pdf

Release Notes:
http://droneamplified.com/downloads/android/App_Release_Notes.pdf

Request features, report bugs, or contact us at:
appdev@droneamplified.com

If you find a bug that causes the app to crash, please email the crash report in Drone Amplified/Crash Reports/ to this email.

title: Drone Controller App Micro XDU
description:
Take Full Control of Your XDU Micro Drones with the Drone Controller XDU Micro App!

Turn your Android smartphone into a powerful, responsive remote control for XDU micro and mini quadcopters using Bluetooth Low Energy (LE). Whether you're new to drones or an experienced pilot, this app provides seamless, precise control, real-time flight feedback, and multiple configuration options to elevate your flying experience.

This free drone controller app supports most XDU Micro Quadcopter models and is designed to work specifically with Bluetooth 4.0+ (LE) enabled Android devices running Android 4.3 and above.
🚀 Key Features of Drone Controller XDU Micro:

✅ Universal Drone Controller
Easily control a wide range of XDU Micro Drones directly from your smartphone. The app is optimized for seamless performance with XDU’s micro quadcopters.

✅ Bluetooth 4.0 LE Connectivity
Establish a secure and low-latency connection to your drone via Bluetooth Low Energy. This ensures quick command response and stable communication during flight. No need for pairing in Bluetooth settings—connect directly through the app!

✅ User-Friendly Touch Controls
Fly with precision using intuitive on-screen controls for Yaw, Pitch, Roll, and Throttle. Experience real-time response and easy maneuverability, ideal for both beginners and advanced users.

✅ Multiple Flight Modes
Switch between different control modes, including:

    Headfree Mode

    Altitude Hold

    IMU Calibration

    Unarm/Launch Functions

✅ Customizable Sensitivity & Control Settings
Adjust your drone’s responsiveness to match your flying style. Choose from various control configurations and fine-tune sensitivity for smoother flights.

✅ Real-Time Flight Feedback
Monitor live flight data such as:

    Pitch Angle (PitchAng)

    Roll Angle (RollAng)

    Yaw Angle (YawAng)

    Altitude

    Flight Distance

    Battery Voltage

✅ Built-in Flight Simulator
Train your flying skills in a safe virtual environment before piloting your actual drone. Perfect for new users who want to get comfortable before takeoff.

✅ Mini Drone Optimized
Especially built for smaller drones like the XDU Micro Quadcopter. Experience responsive handling even in tight spaces.
📱 How to Use the XDU Drone Remote Controller App:

    Ensure Bluetooth is enabled on your Android device.

    Power on your XDU Micro Quadcopter.

    Open the app and search for available drones using Bluetooth.

    Select your drone from the list and connect.

    Begin flying using the on-screen controls.

📌 Important Note:
Do NOT pair the drone manually from the system Bluetooth settings. Connection must be done directly via the app to ensure compatibility and proper function.
🎯 Why Choose Drone Controller XDU Micro?

    100% Free to Use

    No external controller hardware needed

    Lightweight and optimized for fast performance

    Regular updates to improve support and add new features

    Works with a wide variety of XDU micro drones

    Built for all skill levels—from beginners to pros

Whether you're just starting out or already a drone enthusiast, Drone Controller XDU Micro offers a powerful and simple way to get your drone in the air. With advanced features, intuitive touch controls, and complete compatibility with XDU Micro Quadcopters, it's the perfect app for any drone pilot.
📥 Download Now and Take Off!

Start flying today with the ultimate mobile controller for XDU drones. Download Drone Controller XDU Micro and experience smooth, stable, and powerful drone control—right from your Android device.

Don't forget to rate and review our app! Your feedback helps us improve and support more drone models in the future.

title: Go Fly Drones D.J.I Controller
description:
🛸 Take your drone flying experience to new heights with the Go Fly Drones for D.J.I Smart Controller app, a feature-rich remote application designed to provide unparalleled control and convenience for drone enthusiasts.

Compatible with a wide range of drone models, our app ensures you have everything you need at your fingertips, whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pilot.

✨ Key Features:
✈️ Smart Fly Mode: Elevate your flying experience with automated flight paths and advanced navigation assistance. This mode is designed for those who want to focus more on capturing stunning visuals and less on controlling the drone.

🎯Advanced Tracking Capabilities: Utilizes advanced algorithms to predict and follow the most dynamic movements, ensuring your subject is always perfectly captured.

📸 Camera Control Photo & Video: 
+ Photo: Capture high-resolution images with precise control over camera settings. The app supports various shooting modes, including burst shots and timed shots, to get the perfect picture every time. 
+ Video: Record smooth, high-definition videos. Whether you're shooting a short clip or a long film, the app provides full control over frame rates and resolutions to meet your creative needs.

🌄 Panorama Photography: Easily create breathtaking panoramic images. The app automatically stitches multiple shots together, giving you stunning wide-angle photos with minimal effort.

🛰️ Find My Drone: Never lose track of your drone again. This feature helps you locate your drone if it ever goes missing, displaying its last known location on the map and guiding you back to it.

🏠 Home Point: Set a designated return point for your drone. With a single tap, your drone will navigate back to this point, ensuring a safe return home every time.

🎥 Drone Gimbal Direction Adjustment: Achieve the perfect angle for your shots by adjusting the gimbal direction directly from the app. This feature allows you to fine-tune your camera’s position for optimal framing and composition.
- Album Management:
+ Album Video and Photo: Organize and manage all your aerial photos and videos in one place. The app’s album feature allows you to view, edit, and share your media effortlessly.
+ Easily Save to Device: With just a few taps, save your favorite images and videos directly to your mobile device, making it easy to share your aerial adventures with friends and family or on social media.

🧭 User-Friendly Interface
The Go Fly Drones app boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface that makes it easy to navigate through various features and settings. Whether you're setting up a flight path, adjusting camera settings, or reviewing your latest shots, everything is designed to be accessible and straightforward.

🛡️ Enhanced Safety Features
Safety is paramount in drone flying. The Go Fly Drones app includes built-in safety features such as obstacle detection, altitude limits and signal lost behavior to ensure you fly safely and responsibly.

Compatible with: D.J.I Air 2S, D.J.I Mavic Mini 1, *M.a.v.i.c Air/Pro, P.h.a.n.t.o.m 4 Normal/Advanced/Pro/ProV2, P.h.a.n.t.o.m 3 Standard/ 4K/Advanced/Professional, I.n.s.p.i.r.e 1 X3/Z3/Pro/RAW, I.n.s.p.i.r.e 2, S.p.a.r.k, D.J.I Mini 2, D.J.I Mini SE, M.a.v.i.c 2 Enterprise Advanced
For *M.a.v.i.c users, there are some features our app haven't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down (M.a.v.i.c Air2S: double tap is C2, 1-tap is C1)

Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/d/1plyt_dTZQPOfsMRcDdCLxyPzYcGyTiE1/p/1ZI-GQVQe3AtbFQizJipaa9DToGkP2vuN/edit
Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/d/1Jlgc-GIYEMzpdzQwQ8xwOreKUpx2aNSd/p/1XEEGGgwu9jb3LySBRTRYg3cL4-QLWF8L/edit
Contact us via: support.drone.app@gmail.com

We appreciate your feedback. All suggestions are welcome
Disclaimer: We are not an official app, but a support app

🎥 Drone Gimbal Direction Adjustment: Achieve the perfect angle for your shots by adjusting the gimbal direction directly from the app. This feature allows you to fine-tune your camera’s position for optimal framing and composition.
- Album Management:
+ Album Video and Photo: Organize and manage all your aerial photos and videos in one place. The app’s album feature allows you to view, edit, and share your media effortlessly.
+ Easily Save to Device: With just a few taps, save your favorite images and videos directly to your mobile device, making it easy to share your aerial adventures with friends and family or on social media.

🧭 User-Friendly Interface
The Go Fly Drones app boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface that makes it easy to navigate through various features and settings. Whether you're setting up a flight path, adjusting camera settings, or reviewing your latest shots, everything is designed to be accessible and straightforward.

🛡️ Enhanced Safety Features
Safety is paramount in drone flying. The Go Fly Drones app includes built-in safety features such as obstacle detection, altitude limits and signal lost behavior to ensure you fly safely and responsibly.

Compatible with: D.J.I Air 2S, D.J.I Mavic Mini 1, *M.a.v.i.c Air/Pro, P.h.a.n.t.o.m 4 Normal/Advanced/Pro/ProV2, P.h.a.n.t.o.m 3 Standard/ 4K/Advanced/Professional, I.n.s.p.i.r.e 1 X3/Z3/Pro/RAW, I.n.s.p.i.r.e 2, S.p.a.r.k, D.J.I Mini 2, D.J.I Mini SE, M.a.v.i.c 2 Enterprise Advanced
For *M.a.v.i.c users, there are some features our app haven't supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down (M.a.v.i.c Air2S: double tap is C2, 1-tap is C1)

title: ClearSpot-Inspections with DJI
description:
The perfect app for DJI drone pilots. Experience smarter, more intelligent, and powerful flying with ClearSpot. Our technology enables DJI drones to perform complex tasks effortlessly, unlocking your drone's full potential and spotting problems in minutes, not hours.

With AI Computer Vision and Artificial Intelligence capabilities, ClearSpot offers drone pilots unmatched features and functionalities, including:

* Universal Compatibility: Seamlessly integrates with all major drones.
* Plug and Play: Effortless functionality for streamlined operation.
* Advanced Features: From real-time object detection to advanced mapping.

Use Cases

1.Weed Detection:

* Purpose: Identify and classify weeds in agricultural fields for targeted herbicide application.
* How it Works: Drones or ground-based cameras capture images, analyzed by machine learning to detect and classify weeds.

2. Search and Rescue:

* Purpose: Locate missing persons in challenging terrains or disaster areas.
* How it Works: High-resolution imagery from drones or satellites is analyzed to detect human shapes or heat signatures.

3. Solar Panel Crack Detection:

* Purpose: Identify cracks in solar panels to maintain efficiency and lifespan.
* How it Works: Drones capture high-resolution images, analyzed to detect cracks based on surface patterns and anomalies.

4.Solar Panel Dirt Detection:

* Purpose: Detect dirt or debris on solar panels that reduce energy output.
* How it Works: Images are analyzed to identify dirt spots by detecting changes in texture and color.

5. Oil Pipeline Infrastructure Crack Detection:

* Purpose: Detect cracks in oil pipelines to prevent leaks and hazards.
* How it Works: Drones or robots capture images of pipelines, analyzed to identify cracks based on visual characteristics.

6.Oil Pipeline Infrastructure Leak Detection:

* Purpose: Detect leaks in oil pipelines to prevent environmental damage.
* How it Works: Infrared cameras or sensors detect anomalies like temperature changes or gas emissions, pinpointed by machine learning.

7. Wind Turbine Inspection:

* Purpose: Inspect wind turbines for structural damage or wear and tear.
* How it Works: Drones capture detailed images, analyzed to identify damage or wear.

8.Helmet Detection:

* Purpose: Ensure workers in hazardous environments wear helmets for safety.
* How it Works: Surveillance cameras detect helmet presence in real-time, generating alerts if a worker is without a helmet.



How We Support Drone Pilots

* 24/7 Availability: Round-the-clock technical support.
* Personalized Solutions: Tailored assistance for specific needs.
* Instant Resolution: Quick and efficient support for minimal downtime.
* Expert Assistance: Access to seasoned professionals for problem-solving.
* Global Coverage: Comprehensive support across time zones.
* Proactive Monitoring: Early issue detection with proactive system monitoring.
* Transparent Communication: Timely updates and informed support process.
* Diverse Industries: Applications in surveillance, search and rescue, agriculture, and more.

Download the ClearSpot drone app that supports DJI drones and experience the difference.

Supported Drones:

1.  DJI Mavic 3 Enterprise 
2. DJI Mavic 3 Enterprise Multispectral  
3. DJI Mavic 3 Enterprise Thermal
4. DJI Mini 3 Pro
5. DJI Matrice 30
6. DJI Matrice 30T

Supported Controllers: 

Without Screen:

1. RC N1
2. RC N2

With Screen:

1. RC pro
2. Smart Controller
3. RC Plus

title: ENAIRE Drones
description:
Plan your flight:

The ENAIRE Drones application offers help to pilots and operators of UAS and civil unmanned aircraft, making available to them information on the geographical areas of UAS collected in the DR. 517/2024, necessary to be able to carry out its operations safely. This application allows you to consult the restrictions, notices and NOTAMs that may affect your flight, quickly, easily and accessible, from your mobile phone or tablet.

ENAIRE Guarantee:

With the ENAIRE Drones application, you have the trust of ENAIRE, the company of the Ministry of Transport, Mobility and Urban Agenda, which manages air navigation in Spain, which ensures the maximum guarantee of compliance with current regulations.

For everyone's safety, remember that a drone is not a toy, it is an aircraft.

title: Crazyflie Drone Remote Control
description:
Take command of the skies with Drone Remote Controller App for Crazyflie! Our app is designed for both novice and experienced drone pilots, this app provides an immersive FPV (First-Person View) experience, making drone flying more exciting and accessible with high  precision control and an immersive flying experience. 

Convert your smartphone into a remote control drone easily with using this FREE Drone Remote Control For Quadcopter Crazyflie app. Lost your Drone remote by  or it's not functioning properly? Don't worry.. Download this free drone remote control app & turn your android device into Drone Remote Control for Crazyflie quadcopter drones for free.The Connection is established using either the Crazyradio USB dongle or over Bluetooth LE (Crazyflie 2.0 only).

Take control over drones -Crazyflie now, you can do that with Drone Remote Control For Crazyflie It's fun.Remote control for drone is a tool which can replace your physical drone RC. you can control drone with camera with Drone universal remote control for all crazyflie drones.

Drone Remote Control For Crazyflie Drones Features:

👍 Intuitive Controls: Easily navigate and control your Crazyflie drone with our user-friendly interface.

👍 Real-Time Feedback: Get instant feedback on your drone's status and  performance for a seamless flying experience.

👍 Customizable Settings: Tailor your flying experience with customizable control settings and options.

 👍 Flight Modes: Switch between different flight modes to suit your skill level and flying style.

 👍 Safety Features: Built-in safety protocols to ensure safe and secure flights.

👍 Control Crazyflie & Crazyflie 2.0 with Crazyradio on  USB OTG device
👍 Control Crazyflie 2.0 using Bluetooth LE 4.0
👍 Control mode configurable
👍 Control sensitivity configurable
👍 Axis and button mapping configurable (only for game pad)
👍 Control Crazyflie using touch controls
👍 Control Crazyflie using game pad (connected via USB or Bluetooth)
👍 Control Crazyflie using the device's gyroscope
👍 Control LED ring effects (requires Crazyflie 2.0 and optional LED ring deck)
👍 Play the Imperial March melody on the buzzer deck (requires Crazyflie 2.0)
👍 Update Crazyflie using Crazyradio

With Drone Remote Control For Crazyflie Drones you can connect to Crazyflie 2.0 using Bluetooth low energy and both the original Crazyflie and Crazyflie 2.0 using the USB Crazyradio dongle connected with a USB OTG cable.

Why Choose Drone Remote Control - Crazyflie?

Compatibility: Designed specifically for Crazyflie drones, ensuring perfect synchronization.

Performance: Optimized for high performance and low latency, giving you real-time control.

How To Use The Crazyflie Drone Remote Control :

1. The list of firmwares should automatically be filled
➡️make sure you have a network connection

2. Select a firmware
➡️ Select the right one depending on which Crazyflie you want to update (CF1 or CF2).

3. Flash firmware
➡️ for Crazyflie 1, click on "Flash firmware" and switch on the Crazyflie during the next 10 seconds.

➡️ for Crazyflie 2, press the ON/OFF switch of the Crazyflie longer than 1.5 second until one blue LED blinks. Then release the button and both blue LEDs should blink. Then click on "Flash firmware"

4. After a successful flash the Crazyflie will automatically restart in firmware mode and is ready to use.

Please note:

This app is designed to control Crazyflie and Crazyflie 2.0. It requires either a Crazyradio, Crazyradio PA or a Bluetooth LE 4.0 compatible device running Android 4.4+. Only Crazyflie 2.0 can be controlled with Bluetooth LE.
Do not pair the Crazyflie via Bluetooth settings!

Whether you're a beginner learning to fly or an experienced pilot looking to hone your skills, the Drone Remote Control Crazyflie app offers everything you need for an unparalleled drone flying experience. Download now and take to the skies!& don't forget to rate us Thank you...

description:
Effortlessly take control of your drone with the Go Fly Drone Controller Pro! Tailored for the latest drone models, this cutting-edge app ensures seamless compatibility with a wide array of devices, including drones, flycams, and UAVs.

🎯 Key Features of Go Fly Drone Controller Pro:

title: Tello Drone Controller App
description:
🚀 Take full control of your DJI Tello drone using your Android device with this feature-rich Tello drone controller app. Whether you're a beginner learning to fly or an experienced pilot, our app offers smooth, responsive controls, real-time video streaming, and smart AI features that make drone piloting safer and more fun.

This Tello remote control app transforms your smartphone into a powerful flight interface with a clean UI and high-performance design. It's the perfect tool for hobbyists, tech enthusiasts, and drone videographers who want precision and convenience in one place.
🔑 Key Features:

🎮 Virtual Joystick Controls
Take off, land, rotate, and maneuver your drone effortlessly using intuitive touchscreen controls. Designed to mimic the tactile feel of physical controllers.

📺 Live Video Streaming (H.264 Video Feed)
Enjoy smooth real-time video feed directly from your Tello drone. The app decodes H.264 (AVC) encoded video for a seamless streaming experience.

🎯 AI Object Detection (Smart Vision Technology)
Fly smarter with built-in object recognition. Detect and avoid obstacles while capturing dynamic footage using advanced on-device AI.

🔗 Fast & Stable Drone Connection
Instantly connect to your Tello drone via Wi-Fi. Our app ensures a strong signal and uninterrupted communication for reliable flights.

⚙️ Lightweight, Responsive Performance
Built for speed and stability, the app ensures minimal lag and maximum control even on lower-end devices.

🧭 Precise Navigation & Flight Accuracy
Perfect for indoor or outdoor flying, the app provides fine-grained control for hover, direction, and elevation.

📸 Capture & Save Photos & Videos
Record your flights in high resolution, save to your device, and share easily across platforms.
🎓 Easy Setup & Operation

    Turn on your DJI Tello drone.

    Connect your Android phone to the drone’s Wi-Fi network.

    Launch the app and tap “Connect.”

    Start flying using real-time video, object tracking, and smart commands!

This app offers the best DJI Tello control experience on mobile, delivering a balance of powerful features and simplicity.
🚁 Ideal For:

    Drone hobbyists

    Beginners learning to fly

    Videographers using drones

    STEM & educational drone programs

    Anyone looking for a Tello controller app with AI features

💬 Why Users Love This App

✅ Easy to install and use
✅ Optimized for DJI Tello drone
✅ Great video quality with low latency
✅ Accurate control and stable flight
✅ Intelligent detection improves safety and creativity

📥 Download now and fly your DJI Tello drone like a pro!
Whether you're shooting videos, flying indoors, or practicing aerial tricks, this is the all-in-one app to enhance your drone experience.

title: Raspberry PI Drone Controller
description:
📱 **Transform Your Smartphone into the Ultimate Drone Remote Controller!**

Unlock the full potential of your Raspberry Pi drone with Drone RC: Flight Controller Pi, the premier application designed to convert your Android device into a sophisticated and intuitive drone remote control. Trusted by a rapidly growing community of over 50,000 pilots, our app provides a seamless bridge between your smartphone and your drone, offering professional-grade features previously only available with expensive dedicated hardware. Whether you are taking your first flight, capturing breathtaking aerial cinematography, or developing cutting-edge drone applications on your Raspberry Pi, our flight controller app delivers unparalleled control and reliability.

Experience the thrill of flight with features like advanced autopilot navigation, crystal-clear real-time FPV (First Person View) video streaming, and highly responsive, customizable controls. Effortlessly design complex autonomous flight plans, execute precise waypoint missions, manage your drone's camera for stunning photos and videos, and enjoy a truly immersive flight experience. 

🚁 **UNLEASH POWERFUL DRONE CONTROL FEATURES:**

✅ **INTUITIVE FLIGHT CONTROLS:** Master drone navigation with our highly responsive virtual joysticks and customizable button layouts. Tailor the interface to your exact preferences for maximum precision and comfort during flight. Our controls simulate the feel of a physical RC transmitter, providing tactile feedback options and adjustable sensitivity settings for perfect drone handling in any condition.

✅ **ADVANCED AUTONOMOUS FLIGHT PLANNING:** Go beyond manual control! Design sophisticated waypoint missions directly on your device's map interface. Set altitude, speed, heading, and camera actions for each waypoint. Create automated flight paths for tasks like aerial surveying, infrastructure inspection, or automated deliveries. 

✅ **IMMERSIVE REAL-TIME VIDEO STREAMING (FPV):** See what your drone sees! Experience the world from above with a low-latency, high-definition FPV video feed streamed directly to your smartphone screen. Monitor your flight path, frame your shots perfectly, and enjoy a truly captivating first-person perspective. 

✅ **ONE-TOUCH TAKEOFF & LANDING:** Simplify the most critical phases of flight. Initiate automatic takeoff with a single tap, and bring your drone home safely with automated landing procedures. Integrated safety protocols, including return-to-home (RTH) on signal loss or low battery, provide peace of mind for every flight.

✅ **DEDICATED RASPBERRY PI OPTIMIZATION:** Unlike generic drone apps, Drone RC: Flight Controller Pi is built from the ground up for seamless integration with Raspberry Pi-based drone projects. We ensure perfect compatibility with popular flight controller software running on the Pi and support various communication methods (WiFi, Bluetooth, SiK Telemetry Radios). 

✅ **INTEGRATED CAMERA CONTROLS:** Capture professional-quality aerial photography and videography. Remotely trigger photo capture, start/stop video recording, adjust camera angles (gimbal control where supported), and manage camera settings directly from the app interface. 

✅ **COMPREHENSIVE FLIGHT LOGS & ANALYTICS:** Track your progress and improve your piloting skills. Automatically record detailed flight data, including path, duration, distance, altitude, speed, battery usage, and signal strength. Review past flights on a map, analyze performance metrics, and export logs for further analysis or compliance purposes.

✅ **CRITICAL SAFETY ALERTS & GEO-FENCING:** Fly safer with real-time notifications. Receive audible and visual alerts for low battery levels, loss of connection, GPS signal issues, and approaching restricted airspace (requires up-to-date geofencing data). 

📥 **DOWNLOAD NOW and elevate your drone experience!** Join the thousands of pilots who have made Drone RC:

title: Fly Go 4: Drone Controller App
description:
Take full control of your DJI™ drone with Go Fly for DJI™ Drone Controller - the ultimate remote controller app designed for over 40 popular DJI™ drone models! Whether you're a beginner or a pro pilot, Go Fly delivers an intuitive interface, advanced flight controls, and real-time HD video streaming to elevate your flying experience🚀📷

⚠️ Disclaimer:
Go Fly is an independent third-party app developed using DJI’s official Mobile SDK. It is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or an official product of DJI or its subsidiaries. This work has not been authorized, sponsored, or otherwise approved by DJI.

⚠️Drone Compatibility: this Go Fly with Drone Controller app is built on DJI Mobile SDK v4.18, which supports 36+ DJI drones including:
- Mini 2, Mini SE, Air 2S
- Mavic™ Air, Mavic™ Air 2 & Mavic™ Mini
- Mavic 2™ Enterprise (Pro, Advanced, Dual), Mavic 2 Zoom, Mavic 2 Pro & Mavic Pro, Mavic 2 series & Mavic Air
- Phantom™ Series (3 Standard to 4 Pro V2, RTK variants)
- Inspire™ Series (1, 1 Pro/Raw, 2)
- Matrice™ Series (100, 200, 210, 300 RTK, 350 RTK, 600 & 600 Pro)
- Spark™

For Mavic™ drone users, there are some features our app hasn't fully supported yet: Low Battery Warning, Critical Low Battery Warning, Time to Discharge, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Gimbal Mode. Preview media, Play media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down (Mavic™ Air2S: double tap is C2, 1-tap is C1)

⭐ Key Features:

1. Drone Panorama Photography: Effortlessly capture stunning panoramic photos and videos from your drone’s camera, streamed in real-time to your phone for breathtaking aerial footage.

2. No-Fly Zone Map: Stay informed with instant alerts about restricted airspaces near airports, military zones, and sensitive locations to ensure safe and compliant flights.

3. Waypoint Missions: Easily design and execute custom flight paths with our user-friendly waypoint mission planner—perfect for both beginners and experienced pilots.

4. Media Export: Quickly transfer high-quality photos and videos to your device in popular formats like JPG, GeoTIFF, DXF/SHP, PDF, MOV, 4K, and MP4 for effortless sharing and editing.

5. Find My Drone: Use the integrated GPS tracker to locate your drone in case of loss or emergencies, providing peace of mind during every flight.

6. Home Point Setting: Save a designated home location, allowing your drone to automatically return safely in cases of signal loss or low battery.

7. Focus Mode: Gain precise control over your drone’s yaw axis and gimbal to hone in on the perfect shot every time.

And many more interesting features are waiting for you to try!

We are constantly striving to improve and evolve our app, and your feedback fuels our journey. Please share your thoughts or support requests at: support@milkyapps.org
Thank you for being part of our continuing efforts.

Privacy Policy: https://milkyapps.org/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://milkyapps.org/terms-of-service

title: Cyber Robot
description:
Cyber Robot is the first Clementoni Robotics APP for children aged 8 years and upward. This game has been specifically designed so you can control and play with your very own robot.

"The free version of the Science&Play TechnoLogic APP will take you on a stimulating  and exciting adventure with Cyber Robot, giving you an opportunity to study and learn  how a robot works first-hand.  "

"The APP allows you to control and play with Cyber Robot in 4 fun and engaging game modes: Programming, Real Time, Gyro and Self-Learning.  "

Thanks to Bluetooth® technology, you can programme your robot, control its movements in real-time and even guide it using your gyroscope and teach it to understand your commands.

To make the experience even more engaging, you can also access the camera function, which will allow you to photograph and video the robot as it carries out your commands.

What are you waiting for? Download the APP and start having fun now!

With fun light and sound effects and adjustable, speed-controlled movements, Cyber Robot will become an inseparable playmate, who you’ll be able to do lots of amazing activities with, as you discover the basic principles of programming!

title: Apitor Kit
description:
The Apitor Kit app is the perfect companion for your Apitor STEM Robot building sets! It transforms the creative experience for kids with its range of exciting features. Enjoy digital instructions, multiple Bluetooth remote control options, and user-friendly graphical programming to rebuild and play in new and inspiring ways.

With the Apitor Kit app, you can:

- Access complete, easy-to-follow building instructions for all your Apitor Robot models.
- Control your robot effortlessly using various Bluetooth remote control options, with different models enabling a range of movements.
- Utilize intuitive graphical programming, designed for different age levels, to bring your Apitor robots to life.
- Enhance your creations with motors, sensors, and LED lights for dynamic and interactive experiences.
- Explore a wealth of learning resources, including programming guides and mechanical insights.
- Ignite your creativity and make building and coding an exciting adventure!

Discover a new world of fun and learning with Apitor Kit!

title: AIRO
description:
AIRO is a free app that uses Bluetooth® technology to allow you to interact with AIRO using lots of different functions: Training, Real Time, Coding, Dance, Games.

In Training mode you will see how AIRO uses artificial intelligence to recognise and imitate your gestures. 

AIRO can also memorise them and you can ask it to repeat the gestures using the associated voice commands.

In Real Time mode you can control AIRO using the controller and voice commands, or through gestures.

You can use the camera built into your device to shoot videos and take photos while the robot moves and executes your commands.

With the Dance mode you can create videos of yourself and AIRO dancing the same choreography together. 
By performing a series of steps you will be able to create a video to share with anyone you like. Don't forget that it is your job to teach AIRO your dance steps!

In the Coding section you can learn the basics of coding (or programming) and create command sequences to send to your robot.

What are you waiting for? Download the APP and start having fun!
descriptionHTML:

What are you waiting for? Download the APP and start having fun!
summary: AIRO - Artificial Intelligence Robot

title: Power Pong Robot
description:
This app is the perfect companion to your Power Pong robot.  Connect wirelessly to your robot and run drills from your phone.

We have designed our app with many types of users in mind - from those that are learning the fundamentals to those who compete in high-level tournaments.

Feature Overview:

• Create and save drills to run wirelessly on your Power Pong robot
• Drills can hold up to 8 unique balls
• Loaded with a rich variety of preset drills for you to get started
• Speed, spin, and placement of each ball can be individually adjusted
• For ease of use, trajectory is automatically calculated for every ball, but can also be manually adjusted
• Search and sort your drills using customizable tags
• Randomize drills for irregular play or mirror drills for opposite handed players
• Run drills at up to 120 balls per minute for a set duration or indefinitely
• Simulate match situations by grouping drills together and playing them in a specific sequence
• Feeling tired?  Add a timed break before the drill automatically restarts
• Share of drills between friends and coaches

If you run into any issues using the application or have any feedback that you want to share, please send an email to support@powerpong.org

You can now build, code, and program robots, turning complex concepts into enjoyable and accessible experiences. Make use of our comprehensive build guides or let your ideas fly free with your own robot designs – our platform champions open-source, hackable creations. title: Robot CRX FANUC
description:
Even before your cobot is delivered to your company, the CRX FANUC app guides you through a new automation experience through a series of initiation modules:

-Discovery of the CRX cobot
- Unpacking and starting your cobot
- Step-by-step learning, in video, of the different functionalities
 
Le Fil d’Actu is regularly fed with articles or videos concerning the latest developments and updates of the CRX cobot. Don't forget to activate notifications to be informed in preview!
 
Lacking inspiration to increase your productivity and guarantee the well-being of your employees? The Practical Cases section will certainly give you ideas thanks to the feedback from our customers.
 
Among the other features of the CRX FANUC app, you will also find:
-Technical documentation
-The catalog of accessories compatible with the CRX
-Information on the CRX Expert training
-CRX-related events (fairs, webinars, technical days)
  
So don't wait any longer to join the CRX FANUC user community!

- Unpacking and starting your cobot
- Step-by-step learning, in video, of the different functionalities

Le Fil d’Actu is regularly fed with articles or videos concerning the latest developments and updates of the CRX cobot. Don't forget to activate notifications to be informed in preview!

Lacking inspiration to increase your productivity and guarantee the well-being of your employees? The Practical Cases section will certainly give you ideas thanks to the feedback from our customers.

Among the other features of the CRX FANUC app, you will also find:
-Technical documentation
-The catalog of accessories compatible with the CRX
-Information on the CRX Expert training
-CRX-related events (fairs, webinars, technical days)

So don't wait any longer to join the CRX FANUC user community!
summary: The simplest and most complete tool to get started with your FANUC CRX cobot

title: Robotberry
description:
Robotberry is an intuitive app designed to provide seamless control of AI Farm's robots. It connects with the robot via Bluetooth BLE enabling effortless communication with the robot to control movements, execute tasks, and monitor performance in real-time. 
With a user-friendly interface and robust connectivity, this app is the perfect companion for hobbyists, developers, and robotics enthusiasts.

title: NiteAura
description:
NiteAura - Smart Sleep Tracking & ComfortAir Mask Control

Sleep deeper, breathe better, wake refreshed.
NiteAura is the ultimate companion app for your NiteAura ComfortAir Mask, combining advanced sleep tracking with personalized comfort control.

App Features

- Smart Sleep Tracking
Monitor your breathing patterns, sleep cycles, and environment in real-time. Gain insights into your sleep quality with detailed reports every morning.
- ComfortAir Mask Control
Easily adjust your mask's settings for optimal temperature and humidity. Create the perfect breathing environment for deeper, uninterrupted sleep.
- AI-Powered Sleep Optimization
NiteAura learns your sleep habits and automatically adjusts settings to enhance comfort and support healthier sleep.
- Sleep Reports & Insights
Understand your nightly rest with comprehensive data on respiratory rate, breath humidity, and abnormal breathing events.
- Custom Sleep Modes
Choose from Relax Mode, Deep Sleep Mode, or let AI handle everything for you.

Why NiteAura + ComfortAir Mask?

- Breathable, Cloud-Like Comfort
Ultra-soft Air Mesh keeps you cool and comfortable all night.
- Perfect Fit for Every Sleeper
Adjustable strap ensures a secure, pressure-free fit.

How It Works

1. Connect your NiteAura ComfortAir Mask via Bluetooth.
2. Select your preferred sleep mode in the app.
3. Track your sleep and breathing effortlessly.
4. Wake up to personalized sleep insights.

Transform your nights with NiteAura where smart technology meets ultimate comfort.
Better sleep starts here.

Note: This app requires the NiteAura ComfortAir Mask for full functionality.

title: Bioservo
description:
The Bioservo app is used to manage the grip-strengthening gloves Ironhand and Carbonhand from Bioservo Technologies.

In the app, you can customize the gloves according to the user's needs and keep track of your Ironhand systems.



Functions for Carbonhand

When using Carbonhand, the Bioservo app is used to customize the glove for a specific user.

The main features are:
- Calibrating the glove to fit the user’s hand.
- Configure features like responsiveness, force and stickiness, as well as linking sensors to different fingers, all of which can be saved in profiles to be used for different tasks.
- Assign profiles to the three slots in the physical user interface.
- Activate/deactivate the Lock assist function.
- Enable an external button for activating the glove.

title: Remote Control App for ALLUX2
description:
Please note that this app is a dedicated app used only by ALLUX user, certified prosthetists in charge of the ALLUX user and also who have attended the Nabtesco ALLUX certification seminar.

Using the ALLUX remote control app, ALLUX user can easily switch to 5 different walking
modes according to the situation on daily life of each user.

This app consists of the following functions (1) to (5), and ALLUX user can freely use without any restrictions.

(1) Changes to 5 different walking mode
(2) Display on remaining battery level
(3) Reference to ALLUX data
(4) Bluetooth reconnection setting
(5) Changes to the name on each walking mode

The display of this app supports Japanese and English. In the future, we plan to support
multiple languages other than Japanese and English.

For details of this app, see the instruction manual of the Remote Control App.
The Remote Control App instruction manual is a PDF format instruction manual, so you need to install Adobe Acrobat Reader separately.

Manufacturer: Nabtesco Corporation https://www.nabtesco.com/

title: Cockpit
description:
The Cockpit app helps you easily adjust various electronic prostheses and orthoses from Ottobock to your individual needs in the course of everyday life, and to access information about these components. 
•	Select preconfigured MyModes (such as cycling or flexed standing) 
•	Read the charge level of the component
•	Display component feedback
•	Fine-tune component parameters
•	Turn additional component functions on or off
•	Easily switch between multiple saved components
•	Change signal tones
•	Read and reset step counters
•	See the next service date

The number and type of MyModes, functions and configurable parameters depend on the component being used. Some older components are not compatible with the Cockpit app. 
For further information, please contact your O&P professional or cockpit@ottobock.com

The instructions for use are available online https://product-documents.ottobock.com/IFU/INT/4X441-V2/647H1002/01/O/S/F

Manufacturer: 
Otto Bock Healthcare Products GmbH
Brehmstrasse 16 · 1110 Vienna · Austria
T +43 1 523 37 86 · F +43 1 523 22 64
www.ottobock.com

This product meets the applicable European requirements for medical devices.

title: Robot Assist
description:
ABB’s Robot Assist is an application designed to bring to you all the collaborative robot resources and information at your fingertips. Through this app you will get easy access to cobot related documents, manuals, tutorials, videos and much more. 
Without any additional logins and sign-ups, you can get easy and convenient access to a range of ABB’s supporting documentations. Robot Assist will keep you updated about latest news on ABB’s collaborative robot portfolio and help you in learning easy cobot programming via free programming games!
Functionalities:
- Online Tutorials of YuMi, GoFa, SWIFTI cobots and Wizard easy programming software
- Datasheet, brochure and product manuals of all the collaborative robots
- GLB Files for AR viewing of each collaborative robot

title: Unitree Go
description:
key spotlight of the App
1. AI large language model
Embodied AI: AI+robot; large language model empowerment makes human-robot interaction more interesting
2. OTA upgrades
After being authorized by user, the robot will connect to Unitree Cloud to upgrade its programme via OTA, thus enhancing user experience.
3. HD image quality
High-quality image transmission enables users to enjoy smooth video and distinct image
4. Intelligent Avoidance
Agile 4D LiDAR L1 detects forward obstacles, realizes intelligent avoidance and maps and plots the real 3D world.
5. Precise control
Dual stickers for precise control, real-time monitoring of the shooting screen and point cloud map; push button for easy mode switching.
6. Graphical Programming 
Optimized and easy-understanding graphical programming makes program design available within simple operations.

title: Arm Robot Control Makerslab
description:
With this application you can control robotic arms equipped with HC-05 or HC-06 Bluetooth modules and Arduino board.

You can find instructions on assembly and programming of our Robotic Arms in our project area.

https://www.makerslab.it/progetti/

INSTRUCTIONS:
Before using this application you will need to pair the Bluetooth module with your Android device.

Once paired, open the "Makerslab Arm Robot Control" application, tap on "Connect" and select the previously paired Bluetooth Module.
————
Commands → Associated letters
Caliper opening → S
Clamp Closing → s
Gripper rotation + → C
Gripper Rotation – → c
Wrist Rotation + → Q
Wrist Rotation – → q
Elbow Rotation + → T
Elbow Rotation – → t
Shoulder Rotation + → R
Shoulder Rotation – → d
Base Rotation + → U
Basic Rotation – → u
Speed ​​Control → 0 .. 9
Save Point →
Go Home → H
Run → E
RESET → Z

title: ABB Infoservice
description:
Now you can supervise your ABB robots easily from a mobile app. Stay
informed about your robot’s most important events with just a few swipes. If
you have any questions or concerns, you have the option to chat with a
specialist directly through the app. With ABB Infoservice, you receive instant
access to operating status, records of service interventions, and an overview
of your robots and accessories that suit them all in one place.

We continuously monitor all events related to your robots. ABB Infoservice will always notify you, so you will never miss any crucial information. We are
always happy to help you detect a potential defect and eliminate it via chat.
You decide whether you want to handle the repair yourself or request the
assistance from the ABB service department.

In case of an urgent hotline intervention, you can use the chat in the app, confirm the dispatch, and track the technician’s arrival status. You can view details
about your ABB robots in the My Robots section. Have you discovered an
ideal accessory for your robot? Just select the offer that interests you and
send us a non-binding inquiry.

Servicing industrial robots has never been simpler!

Contact your sales representative today to take advantage of all the benefits
ABB Infoservice has to offer.

Functions:
Events - information channel of the Digital Service
• Chat (including images and videos)
• Connected Services
• Information
• News
• Hotline
• Service

Cases - records of all service interventions
• Documents
• Used spare parts
• Hours worked

My robots - device list
• Overview
• Notes
• Mechanical units
• Documents

Accessories - offer of the most requested accessories

Contacts
• Hotline
• Service
• Preventive controls
• Spare parts
• Technical support
• System service
• Training
