title: Fly Go 4: Drone Camera Remote
description: 🌟 Unlock the skies with Fly Go 4 and take your drone experience to new heights! 🚀📈 Compatibility: 🛠️ Fly Go 4 is built on Mobile SDK v4.18, which supports a wide range of drones. There are 36 drone models supported in this version: 🛩️ Air 2S 🛩️ Mini 2 🛩️ Mini SE 🚁 Mavic Air 🚁 Mavic Air 2 🚁 Mavic Mini 🚁 Mavic 2 Enterprise 🚁 Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced 🚁 Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual 🚁 Mavic 2 Pro 🚁 Mavic 2 Zoom 🚁 Mavic Pro 🛸 Phantom 3 Standard 🛸 Phantom 3 Advanced 🛸 Phantom 3 Professional 🛸 Phantom 3 4K 🛸 Phantom 4 🛸 Phantom 4 Advanced 🛸 Phantom 4 Pro 🛸 Phantom 4 Pro V2 🛸 Phantom 4 RTK 🚀 Inspire 1 🚀 Inspire 1 Pro/Raw 🚀 Inspire 2 🛰️ Matrice 100 🛰️ Matrice 200 🛰️ Matrice 200 V2 🛰️ Matrice 210 🛰️ Matrice 210 V2 🛰️ Matrice 210 RTK 🛰️ Matrice 210 RTK V2 🛰️ Matrice 300 RTK 🛰️ Matrice 350 RTK 🛰️ Matrice 600 🛰️ Matrice 600 Pro ✨ Spark ⚠️ For Mavic users, there are some features our app hasn't supported yet ⚠️: Low Battery Warning 🔋⚠️, Critical Low Battery Warning 🚨🔋, Time to Discharge ⏳, Sync Gimbal with Aircraft Heading, Lock Gimbal When Shooting, Gimbal Mode. Play media, Preview media, On/Off Head LEDs & Camera Forward/Down (Mavic Air 2S: double tap is C2, 1-tap is C1). 📢 Disclaimer: 🚫 We want to clarify that this application is not an official app but a support app using the official Mobile SDK provided by the official manufacturer ✅. Still, this app can work perfectly with all drone models above and their RCs. ⚠️🔗Additionally, it is not affiliated with or endorsed by any mentioned company, it is not an official product of that company or its affiliates. 🏆 Fly Go 4 is the ultimate companion app for your drones, designed to offer unparalleled control, ease of use, and a seamless flying experience. Whether a beginner 🐣 or a seasoned drone pilot 🎖️, Fly Go 4 provides the tools and features to explore the skies confidently and creatively 🌤️📸. 🚁 Why Choose Fly Go 4? ✨ 🖥️ Intuitive Interface: Our user-friendly interface ensures easy drone operation, providing clear information for a smooth flying experience, whether you're a beginner 🐣 or an experienced pilot 🎖️. 🎮 Advanced Flight Controls: Take full control of your drones with Fly Go 4's advanced flight features, which allow for precision and accuracy in complex maneuvers and effortless aerial shot capture 📸. 📹 Real-Time Video Transmission: Experience real-time HD video transmission directly to your mobile device. With Fly Go 4, you can see exactly what your drone sees, allowing you to make quick decisions and adjustments for the best possible footage 📸✨. 🎯 Smart Flight Modes: Capture professional-quality videos and photos with intelligent flight modes like 🏃‍♂️ ActiveTrack, 🎯 FocusTrack, 📍 Point of Interest , 🚀 QuickShot, 🔦 Spotlight,... It is ideal for dynamic action scenes or serene landscapes 🌄. 📊 Comprehensive Flight Data: Keep track of all your flight details with in-depth flight data logging. Fly Go 4 records your drone's flight path, altitude, speed, and more, providing valuable insights to improve your flying skills 🚀. 📁 Easy Media Management: Manage your photos and videos directly within the app with QuickTransfer 💾. 🏆 Fly Go 4 is the ultimate companion app for your drones, designed to offer unparalleled control, ease of use, and a seamless flying experience. Whether a beginner 🐣 or a seasoned drone pilot 🎖️, Fly Go 4 provides the tools and features to explore the skies confidently and creatively 🌤️📸.

🚁 Why Choose Fly Go 4? ✨

🖥️ Intuitive Interface: Our user-friendly interface ensures easy drone operation, providing clear information for a smooth flying experience, whether you're a beginner 🐣 or an experienced pilot 🎖️.

🎮 Advanced Flight Controls: Take full control of your drones with Fly Go 4's advanced flight features, which allow for precision and accuracy in complex maneuvers and effortless aerial shot capture 📸.

📹 Real-Time Video Transmission: Experience real-time HD video transmission directly to your mobile device. With Fly Go 4, you can see exactly what your drone sees, allowing you to make quick decisions and adjustments for the best possible footage 📸✨.

🎯 Smart Flight Modes: Capture professional-quality videos and photos with intelligent flight modes like 🏃‍♂️ ActiveTrack, 🎯 FocusTrack, 📍 Point of Interest , 🚀 QuickShot, 🔦 Spotlight,... It is ideal for dynamic action scenes or serene landscapes 🌄.

📊 Comprehensive Flight Data: Keep track of all your flight details with in-depth flight data logging. Fly Go 4 records your drone's flight path, altitude, speed, and more, providing valuable insights to improve your flying skills 🚀.

📁 Easy Media Management: Manage your photos and videos directly within the app with QuickTransfer 💾. Access, edit, and share your stunning aerial footage with friends and family, or upload it to social media to showcase your skills 🌟.

🛡️ Safe Flying: Safety is our priority. Fly Go 4 includes built-in safety features like obstacle detection, return-to-home (RTH) 🏠🚁, and flight zone restrictions to ensure that your flights are safe and secure 🔒.

🌤️ Take your drone experience to new heights! 🚀 Download Fly Go 4 now and explore endless aerial possibilities! 🌅📷

title: DroneControl - Live stream DJI
description:
Live stream with ultra low latency to anyone in the World and even let them take control of your drone flight/gimbal controls 🎮.

Live streaming

Ultra low latency P2P live streaming to viewers. Your viewers don’t need another app to view live stream, just send them a unique web link (example https://app.dronecontrol.co/) via your favourite messaging app so that they can tune in to your flight via Web browser.

Remote viewer gimbal control

Let your viewers take control of the DJI drone gimbal camera. Viewers can pan and zoom gimbal camera via a simple Web app.

Remote viewer flight control

Let your viewers take control of the DJI drone flight controls. They can control it via a simple Web app, with full telemetry and video available to them in real time.

Unique key features

Ultra low latency⏱

Advanced technology enables us to live stream video with sub 1s latency. Therefore viewers across the World can see your stream in real time and therefore can also fly it without issues related to latency.

Multiple viewers👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Multiple viewers can watch live stream, though video quality depends on the mobile network speed of the streamer.

P2P streaming - full privacy🕵️‍♂️

Live video feed does not pass through the server, therefore complete privacy is guaranteed.

Viewer Flight control options🎮

Your viewers can control your drone using either virtual joysticks controlled by touch control/mouse or by gamepad controller (PS/Xbox).

Enable/disable features☑️

Remote gimbal and flight control can be enabled/disabled for each viewer via a special status page in the app.

Take back control of the drone🕹️

You can instantly disable viewer remote control by slightly moving either left/right joysticks on your controller.

Supported hardware:

• Mavic Pro • Mavic 2 Pro • Mavic 2 Zoom • Mavic 2 Enterprise • Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced • Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual • Mavic Mini 1 • Mavic Mini SE • Mavic Mini 2 • Mavic Air 1 • Mavic Air 2 • Mavic Air 2S • Phantom 4 Pro V2 • Phantom 4 Professional • Phantom 4 Advanced • Phantom 4 • Phantom 4 RTK • Phantom 3 4K • Phantom 3 SE • Phantom 3 Professional • Phantom 3 Advanced • Phantom 3 Standard • Matrice 100 • Matrice 200 • Matrice 210 • Matrice 210 RTK • Matrice 210 V2 • Matrice 300 RTK • Matrice 600 • Matrice 600 Pro • Inspire 1 • Inspire 1 Pro • Inspire 2 To find out more about DroneControl please visit https://consumer.dronecontrol.co/ To find out more about End-user license agreement please visit https://consumer.dronecontrol.co/eula

title: Dazz Drones - Book Drone Shoot
description:
Founded in Spain, with global command centers and operations in 43 countries, Dazz Drones connects businesses and creators to the skies through a network of 1,000+ certified drone pilots worldwide. Every single day, we successfully complete 250+ drone shoots globally, delivering aerial photography and drone videography for real estate, travel, maritime inspections, events, film production, wedding drone shoots, construction site monitoring, vlogs, and enterprise drone services.

With over 10 years of experience in professional drone photography, pilot coordination, and customer service, our app-based platform lets you book drone pilots in minutes—no calls, no confusion, no delays. Whether you need real estate aerial photography, event drone filming, wedding drone videography, or drone inspection services, Dazz Drones makes it simple, fast, and reliable.

We operate exclusively with the latest DJI drones, giving clients full control to choose:

Preferred drone models for cinematic and commercial shoots

Flexible booking slots: 3, 6, or 12 hours, and multi-day drone shoots

Exact location and time scheduling for aerial photography and videography

Behind every flight is our Global Command Center, ensuring smooth execution with expert support for:

Location clearances for legal drone operations

Weather tracking for safe and compliant flights

Visual and regulatory compliance

On-time delivery of high-quality aerial footage

From high-rise real estate drone photography in Miami to cinematic rooftop drone filming in Berlin, port inspection drones in Abu Dhabi, or farmland drone surveys in Valencia, our teams operate with local precision and global expertise.

When you choose Dazz Drones, you’re not just booking a shoot—you’re partnering with a global drone photography and videography company, designed to deliver breathtaking aerial visuals anywhere, anytime.

250+ Drone Shoots Every Day | 1,000+ Certified Drone Pilots | 43+ Countries | One Simple Drone Booking App

Dazz Drones – The world’s fastest and most trusted way to hire professional drone pilots for photography, videography, inspections, and events.

THE TECHNOLOGY BEHIND DAZZ DRONES

Advanced Engineering: Built on Flutter, ensuring a fast, seamless, and consistent user experience across iOS, Android, and Web.

Global Expertise: Developed by a team of tech experts from Europe, America, Asia, and the Middle East.

Localized Experience: Automatic language switching for a smooth, region-specific experience.

Top Security: Advanced encryption and robust data protection.

Secure Payments: Integrated with Stripe for safe and reliable transactions.

title: DJI Store - Try Virtual Flight
description:
A must-have smartphone app for DJI users
【Device Management】
1. Track usage and check remaining DJI Care days. 
2. One-stop online after-sales service for repairs, replacements, and flyaway scenarios. 
3. Enhance your skills with online courses. 
4. Resolve issues with official guides.
【Elevate Your Creation】
1. Virtual Flight: Fun practice before the actual flight.
2. DJI Forum: Exchange ideas and find answers to your questions.
3. SkyPixel: Share your creations and experience new products.
【Comprehensive Product Selection】
1. Newest DJI products.
2. All accessories.
【Exclusive Benefits】
1. Shopping rewards in the form of DJI Credit, which can be used to pay for purchases from the DJI Online Store.
2. Exclusive gifts with purchase, including limited DJI merchandise for select products.
3. Early notice for exclusive monthly discounts.



About DJI
Since its establishment in 2006, DJI has given the world groundbreaking innovations in drones, handheld imaging, robotics education, and much more, reshaping entire industries and improving lives. DJI works tirelessly with partners from across the globe to usher in an era of spatial intelligence beyond imagination.
Contact us at: www.dji.com/contact

title: SkyyPilot - For drone pilots
description:
SkyyTask has created this app designed for licensed drone pilots to connect with consumers and have a streamlined platform to bid work and grow their business!  We wanted to be the first to simplify the way a pilot can setup a profile, build their bio, showcase the areas they specialize in, meet clients, bid jobs and expand their ability to efficiently and effectively keep their drones busy. We believe in empowering pilots to feel like they have control over their pricing based on their equipment, expertise and location. An array of jobs can be offered to bid, for example but not limited to - Real Estate (Commercial / Residential), 3D Mapping, Deer Recoveries, Missing Pets, Renewable Energy (Solar / Wind), Agriculture, Thermal Inspections and so much more!  This app is for businesses and the average licensed pilot looking to create opportunities with their drone. SkyyTask has also built an integrated website that performs like the mobile app for those who also work from their PC or Mac. This app offers a variety of features that makes the process user friendly, yet detailed, connecting you with job opportunities, all at your finger tips.
Note:
• Both Pilot and Client have one round of negotiating. 
• Once bid is accepted from both parties, the client is prompted to Stripe for payment. 
“Skyy’s the limit - Trust us to take your vision to new heights!”

SkyyTask has created this app designed for licensed drone pilots to connect with consumers and have a streamlined platform to bid work and grow their business! We wanted to be the first to simplify the way a pilot can setup a profile, build their bio, showcase the areas they specialize in, meet clients, bid jobs and expand their ability to efficiently and effectively keep their drones busy. We believe in empowering pilots to feel like they have control over their pricing based on their equipment, expertise and location. An array of jobs can be offered to bid, for example but not limited to - Real Estate (Commercial / Residential), 3D Mapping, Deer Recoveries, Missing Pets, Renewable Energy (Solar / Wind), Agriculture, Thermal Inspections and so much more! This app is for businesses and the average licensed pilot looking to create opportunities with their drone. SkyyTask has also built an integrated website that performs like the mobile app for those who also work from their PC or Mac. This app offers a variety of features that makes the process user friendly, yet detailed, connecting you with job opportunities, all at your finger tips.
Note:
• Both Pilot and Client have one round of negotiating.
• Once bid is accepted from both parties, the client is prompted to Stripe for payment.
“Skyy’s the limit - Trust us to take your vision to new heights!”
summary: Trust us to take your vision to new heights

title: PotensicPro
description:
PotensicPro is a professional flight control application.
The App shows real-time video transmission, displays flight parameters and allows you to customize, shoots HD images and records videos, etc.   

Main Characteristics:
1.GPS positioning, display the accurate position of the drone.
2. Map navigation, show map information and flight path.
3. Real-time HD video transmission, HD image and video recording.
4. Customize the flight parameters.
5. Intuitive and support intelligent flights.

title: GoFundMe: Fundraise and Give
description:
Welcome to the world’s most powerful community for good, where everyone can give and get help. Launch a fundraiser in minutes, start a donor-advised fund to support all your favorite nonprofits in one place, and inspire your community with your GoFundMe Profile. There’s so much you can do on GoFundMe.
 
START A FUNDRAISER
Launch a fundraiser for yourself, a friend or a nonprofit. Manage your fundraiser on the go and share your unique fundraiser link with your community to spread the word. App notifications help you never miss a donation alert or an important update about your fundraiser.

*NEW* ALL YOUR GIVING IN ONE PLACE WITH GIVING FUNDS
Giving Funds are donor-advised funds (DAF) that allow you to simplify giving and maximize impact while growing your contribution tax-free. You can donate the funds to a nonprofit of your choice at any time. During tax season, you'll get one receipt that shows all of your giving, all in one place.

GIVE FORWARD WITH GOFUNDME PROFILES
Share the causes you care about and inspire your community to help. Feature your favorite fundraisers and nonprofits, and track your impact from fundraisers you’ve started and supported.

title: Genkinno
description:
Welcome to Genkinno! Congratulations on becoming the owner of a Genkinno robotic pool cleaner. We want to ensure that you have the best experience possible with our product.
The Genkinno robotic pool cleaner is designed to keep your pool clean and your water crystal-clear. With the Genkinno app, you have complete control over the robot and its functions.
Our app connects to your mobile Bluetooth® device, allowing you to access and control your Genkinno robotic pool cleaner from anywhere, at any time.
Here are some of the features of the Genkinno App:
* Firmware Upgrades
* Robot Naming
* And much more.
We are also proud to offer exceptional customer care support to our users. Our team is always ready and available to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.
Thank you for choosing Genkinno as your pool cleaning solution. We hope you enjoy using our product as much as we enjoyed creating it.

title: X DRONE PRO
description:
X DRONE PRO is the control center tailor-made for our X-Series drones. It combines intuitive operation with powerful features to deliver a stable and smooth flight experience, helping you capture unique perspectives with ease.
【Key Features】
🎙️ Voice Control
Command your drone with your voice. Simply say "Take off," "Land," "Move left," or "Take photo" to control the flight hands-free, allowing you to focus on framing and creativity.
📸 Photo & Video
Take full control of the drone's camera. Adjust settings and capture stunning high-resolution photos and 4K videos. Save and share your masterpieces with just one tap.
👋 Gesture Recognition
Go controller-free. Use preset hand gestures to trigger actions like taking a photo or starting a recording. Perfect for group selfies and hands-free operation.
🎮 Virtual Joystick
An intuitive and responsive virtual joystick on your screen provides precise control, making piloting straightforward and accessible for everyone.

Download X DRONE PROtoday and unleash the full potential of your X-Series drone!

title: DiveMate (Scuba Dive Log)
description: DiveMate is the dive log book app to quickly and easily document your diving experiences. Connect your dive computer, transfer dives and enrich them with personal experiences via picture, video and notes. https://www.divemate.de For some dive computer models we offer DiveMate Fusion accessories for the transfer. DiveMate is also very well suited for diving instructors in training. Students' dive computers can be read directly after diving and analyzed on the tablet using the profile. DiveMate is optimized for smartphones and tablets. The logbook with manual entry of dives does not need any additional packs. Powerful additional features can be supplemented with the one-time purchase of "Extension Packs" and used on all Android devices.    Features: • Transfer from your dive computer (supports over 170 models from 22 manufacturers via USB, Infrared and Bluetooth [Transfer Pack]) • This allows fast and easy logging of dives • Complete logbook: Paper and PC no longer required • Optimized for smartphones and tablets of all sizes • Display of depth, pressure and temperature profile • Capture your diving experiences with pictures, notes and buddies with signatures • All dive data plus RMV/SAC, weight, bottle and gas parameters • Brevet and medical instructions • Multi-Edit function: updating equal fields of several dives with one change (advantage compared to dive templates) • Share your dives and dive sites • Merge dives and re-number dives comfortably • Dive site management with over 20 online maps (also via GPS) • Save many online maps for offline use when traveling [Map Pack] • Multiple divers (for at least one pack for more than 2 divers) • Print: logbook, profile, dive site map [Data Pack] • Backup & Sync between Android devices via Dropbox [Data Pack] • Sync with PC/Mac programs [Data Pack] • Statistics • Nitrox MOD calculator • Works on liveaboards or off the coast without internet connection • Continuous development and improvement based on user feedback • Languages: English,German,Italian,French,Spanish,Dutch,Russian Supported scuba dive computers: • AERIS A300 ai,A300 CS,Atmos 2,Atmos ai,Atmos ai 2,Atmos Elite,CompuMask,Elite T3,Elite T3.1,Epic 1,Epic For some dive computer models we offer DiveMate Fusion accessories for the transfer.

DiveMate is also very well suited for diving instructors in training. Students' dive computers can be read directly after diving and analyzed on the tablet using the profile.

DiveMate is optimized for smartphones and tablets. The logbook with manual entry of dives does not need any additional packs. Powerful additional features can be supplemented with the one-time purchase of "Extension Packs" and used on all Android devices.

title: OceanEyes
description:
OceanEyes: Observing Citizen Engagement - Accessible Network of Environmental Sightings

Welcome to OceanEyes, a platform dedicated to the wonder and preservation of marine life in the Indian Ocean. Our app empowers you to be an active participant in marine species conservation and exploration.

Discover Marine Biodiversity: Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing world of marine biodiversity. With OceanEyes, you can document and share your observations of the incredible marine species inhabiting the Indian Ocean. Every sighting contributes to a greater understanding of these diverse and delicate ecosystems.

Community of Marine Enthusiasts: OceanEyes brings together a community of passionate individuals who share your love for the ocean. Connect with like-minded enthusiasts, engage in discussions, and work collaboratively with others who are equally dedicated to marine conservation.

Promote Conservation: Your observations have a profound impact. By sharing your findings with the OceanEyes community, you play a vital role in marine species conservation. Together, we're raising awareness about the importance of our oceans and striving to protect and sustainably manage their diverse ecosystems.

Stay Informed: OceanEyes keeps you updated with the latest news, projects, and initiatives in the realm of marine biology and ecology. We believe that staying informed is a crucial part of marine conservation.

Join Our Mission: OceanEyes is a flagship initiative under the Deep Ocean Mission project by the Centre for Marine Living Resources & Ecology. We invite you to be part of this mission, contributing to a better understanding of marine biodiversity and promoting the conservation and sustainable management of our oceans.

Download OceanEyes now, and embark on a journey of discovery, conservation, and community engagement. Your passion for marine species observation is making a tangible difference, and we can't wait to explore the depths of the Indian Ocean with you.

*Together, let's make our oceans a better place for all its inhabitants. *

Download OceanEyes and become a marine conservationist today.

title: Maven - For DJI Drones
description:
Fly Your DJI™ Drone Like Never Before!
Take your drone experience to the next level with all the advanced features you’ve been waiting for:
Waypoint Missions
GPS Follow/Track Me
VR with Head Tracking
Cable Cam
Automatic Orbit
...and much more!
Autonomous Waypoint Missions
Plan and execute complex waypoint routes with ease.

Features include:
Intuitive interface for route design.
POI functionality and Corner Radius.
Altitude Above Ground option.
Smooth and progressive drone/gimbal rotations.
Save, browse, and share missions.
Waypoint actions.
Search locations and plan with precision.
Virtual Co-Pilot
Perfect for drones without native Point of Interest functionality (e.g., Mavic Mini).

Your Co-Pilot helps you:
Automatically rotate the drone and camera to focus on a selected POI.
Perform advanced maneuvers like Orbit, Follow/Track Me, and Cable Cam.
The Co-Pilot makes professional shots accessible, even for beginners!

Follow Me!
Enjoy a complete GPS-based follow functionality:
Track Me: Follow from any direction.
Altitude Follow: Maintain altitude automatically.*
Orbit While Follow: Combine follow and orbit.
Live updates to follow parameters.
Automatic home-point updates for safety.
(*Requires GPS and barometer-equipped devices.)

VR Functionality
Experience immersive drone flying with any VR headset!
Fully customizable VR view: adjust position, size, and eye-width.
Animated on-screen display with essential flight information.
Head Tracking:
Move the gimbal up/down on all supported drones.
Move the gimbal left/right (Mavic 2 series, Mavic Air 2, Air 2S).
Switch to your device camera for easy navigation while wearing the headset.

AR Localizer
Enhance your situational awareness with Augmented Reality locators:
Green: Home position.
Red: Selected POI location and distance.
Blue: GPS position of the piloting device.
(Note: GPS, compass, or barometer errors may affect accuracy.)

Complete Camera Control
Access and adjust all camera settings directly in the app.

FCC Mode Friendly
The app doesn’t automatically revert drones set to FCC mode back to CE mode.

Sync Flight Logs with AirData UAV
Easily sync and analyze your flight logs with AirData UAV for detailed performance insights.

Compatible DJI™ Drones
This app is optimized for:
Mavic Air, Mavic Air 2, Mavic Air 2S, Mavic Mini, Mavic Mini 2, Mavic Mini SE,
Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual, Mavic 2 Enterprise, Mavic 2 Pro, Mavic 2 Zoom,
Mavic Pro Alpine, Mavic Pro Platinum, Mavic Pro, and Spark.

Unlock your drone's full potential and elevate your flying experience.
Download the app now and start flying smarter today!

title: KEIRO™
description:
A key element of any robotics system is the programming software. ENGINO® has developed a special software, KEIRO, which is a block-based programming platform that allows different methods of programming depending on the user’s needs and capabilities. 
The robot can also be programmed manually using the on-board buttons. The software is used for editing the program and adding complex functionality with the use of a user friendly Flow Diagram Interface.
descriptionHTML:
A key element of any robotics system is the programming software. ENGINO® has developed a special software, KEIRO, which is a block-based programming platform that allows different methods of programming depending on the user’s needs and capabilities.
The robot can also be programmed manually using the on-board buttons. The software is used for editing the program and adding complex functionality with the use of a user friendly Flow Diagram Interface.
summary: KEIRO: Engino's new robotics platform

title: Cell Hero
description: Cell Hero is a strategic simulation game that immerses players in a world where they must lead an army of cells to combat enemies and reclaim their homeland. Players are tasked with earning rewards through successful missions to strengthen their cellular soldiers. The game's unique twist involves crafting an exclusive hero lineup that triggers wondrous chemical reactions, enhancing gameplay. With a plethora of quirky weapons and potent skills to discover, "Cell Hero" promises a blend of management and adventure as players forge ahead in this captivating cellular saga.

title: Lynx® Drive Mobile
description:
Access Your Lynx® Central Control System—Anytime. Anywhere.

Lynx® Drive Mobile by Toro® puts the power of the Lynx® Central Control System into the palm of your hand. Designed specifically for golf course irrigation professionals, this app gives you complete control, insight, and mobility to manage your course with confidence—on or off the property.

Whether you’re inspecting greens, walking fairways, or off-site, Lynx Drive delivers secure access to real-time system data, intuitive controls, and the tools you need to keep your course performing at its best

- Interactive Course Map – Navigate your system with a full-coverage map and one-tap access to every station.
- Run Water Instantly – Execute manual irrigation by time or amount from any location.
- Track Every Action - Stay up to date with real-time alerts, flags, and notes.
- Add Smart Notes – Log course observations, repairs, and photos directly within the app.
- At-a-Glance Status – Monitor all programs performance and activity in one streamlined view.
- Station configuration and troubleshooting tools - Diagnose, sync, replace decoder address or isolate station-level problems instantly.

Built for today’s irrigation professional, Toro Lynx® Drive Mobile delivers the clarity, control, and confidence you need to stay a step ahead—on the go.

NSN Portal credentials are required to connect the mobile app with the Lynx® Drive Central Control desktop system.
The desktop system must be connected to the network.
The mobile device must have an active internet connection (cellular or Wi-Fi).

title: AES Smart
description:
AES Global Ltd proudly present the AES Smart App which will provide access to a range of our IP products. Such as the Praetorian Guard IP Video Intercom, IP Cameras and more to come.

In use with our intercom, the app will allow you to see and hear your visitors in real time, speak with them or unlock the gate or door. When visitors press the call button, you receive a push notification on your phone or tablet and can immediately answer your intercom – from anywhere in the world. It can also send instant alerts when a visitor triggers the built-in motion sensor or uses the keypad or PROX reader (if applicable on your model). No matter if you are at home or not, you will never miss a visitor or a delivery.

Our IP technology is continuously improved through regular app and hardware updates. The systems will works in your local network (LAN) as well as outside of your home network environment without range limitation. You can connect the devices to the internet via CAT5 cable or WIFI connection.

AES Smart Features:
• Live HD video (120 camera lens & night vision)

• 2-way audio communication

• Worldwide mobile access to Praetorian Guard IP Video Intercoms

• Push notifications on your smartphone or tablet when the call button is

pushed, motion sensor is triggered or keypad/prox code is used.

• Program 24-7 / Timed and Temporary Keypad codes or PROX ID's

• Past 100 event history

• Up to 8 separate users with different permission levels

• SD card storage for all video & picture files. (Can accommodate up to 32GB)

• Voicemail - Visitors can leave a video messages when unanswered

• Do-Not-Disturb (DND) - Disable the call button to avoid getting calls.

Note that you are required to create an account, and have an AES product to connect to the app.

title: Doly
description:
Doly is the AI-powered companion robot that evolves uniquely through interaction, showcasing an engaging personality and undeniable charm. Designed for users of all ages, Doly is more than a robot; it's a learning companion, entertainer, and friend.

With the Doly Robot control app, you can unlock endless possibilities by customizing and interacting with your Doly like never before. Featuring intuitive block-based programming, the app allows you to easily instruct Doly with simple, visual commands, making it accessible and enjoyable for beginners and advanced users alike.

The block-based programming interface supports STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics) education, empowering users to develop critical thinking, creativity, and problem-solving skills in a fun, interactive environment.

In addition, the Doly Robot control app includes a remote control feature, allowing you to maneuver Doly seamlessly from your smartphone, tablet, or computer. Explore your environment, navigate through obstacles, and enjoy interactive adventures with full remote control capabilities.

Whether you're a parent, educator, student, or tech enthusiast, Doly and its control application offer a captivating journey into robotics and artificial intelligence. Dive into the future of interactive learning and companionship with Doly today!

Doly robot required. Get yours at doly.ai

title: Misty Breez
description:
The simplest self-custodial app for sending and receiving Lightning payments, powered by Breez SDK (Nodeless).

Features: 
🔥 Sending payments via various protocols such as: Bolt11, Bolt12, BIP353, LNURL-Pay, Lightning address, BTC address
🔥 Receiving payments via various protocols such as: Bolt11, LNURL-Withdraw, LNURL-Pay, Lightning address, BTC address
🔥 A built-in, customizable user@breez.fun Lightning address
🔥 Receive payments even when the app is offline (requires notifications)
🔥 No channel or liquidity management
🔥 Self-custodial: keys are only held by users
🔥 Free open-source software

title: Dawn Gathering
description:
Welcome to the Wasteland Chronicles.  
In this immersive multiplayer strategy survival game, you’ll step into the shoes of a post-apocalyptic survivor. Rally others to your cause, construct a fortified underground sanctuary, and venture into the perilous wasteland. Eliminate mutated threats, scavenge precious resources and relics from the past, uncover secrets buried in the ruins, unite your alliance to forge a new world order, and restore humanity’s lost glory.  

Scout! Expand! Conquer!  Take back your world from the clutches of monstrous invaders.  

Game Features:  

☆ Immersive Post-Apocalyptic World ☆  
Traverse a vast, dynamic wasteland filled with crumbling cities, abandoned fleets, haunting prisons, and derelict hospitals. Explore a sprawling map, eradicate mutants, recover hidden treasures, and scavenge essential supplies to piece together the mystery of the apocalypse.  

☆ Construct an Unbreakable Sanctuary ☆  
Gather resources, rescue fellow survivors, and build an impenetrable underground refuge. Defend against waves of mutant attacks, provide safety for your people, and lay the groundwork for humanity’s rebirth.  

☆ Thrilling Tactical Combat ☆  
Command your forces with strategic precision, utilizing flexible movement mechanics to outmaneuver enemies. Engage in dynamic battles, customize your heroes’ abilities, and experience the adrenaline of defeating hordes of mutants.  

☆ Assemble a Legendary Survivor Team ☆  
Recruit survivors with unique skills, train elite heroes, upgrade their gear, and forge a formidable army to face mutant threats and unknown dangers.  

☆ Forge a Dominant Alliance ☆  
Join forces with other players, form alliances, and unite survivors to combat mutants, hostile factions, and ambitious rivals. Protect and expand your territory in this harsh new world.  

☆ Deep Strategic Gameplay ☆  
In this unforgiving wasteland, survival demands cunning and adaptability. Build diverse armies, craft optimal hero lineups, and adapt your strategies to counter different enemies and environments. Rise as the ultimate wasteland commander.  

☆ Power Grid System ☆  
In this era of chaos, light is scarce—but hope remains. Manage limited energy resources to keep your sanctuary operational and fend off darkness. Power is the key to survival, offering hope and progress, yet it also draws the attention of external threats.  

Who will claim dominion over the wasteland—humanity or the mutants?

title: Sora by OpenAI
description:
Turn your ideas into videos and drop yourself into the action.

Sora is a new kind of creative app that turns text prompts and images into hyperreal videos with sound using the latest advancements from OpenAI. A single sentence can unfold into a cinematic scene, an anime short, or remix of a friend's video. If you can write it, you can see it, remix it, and share it. Turn your words into worlds with Sora.

Explore, play, and share your imagination in a community built for experimentation.

What’s possible with Sora

Create Videos in Seconds
Start with a prompt or image and Sora generates a complete video with audio inspired by your imagination.

Collaborate & Play
Cast yourself or your friends in videos. Remix challenges and trends as they evolve.

Choose Your Style
Make it cinematic, animated, photorealistic, cartoon, or entirely surreal.

Remix & Make It Yours
Take someone else’s creation and put your spin on it - swap characters, change the vibe, add new scenes, or extend the story.

Find Your Community
Community features make it easy to share your creations and see what others are making.

Terms of use & privacy policy:
https://openai.com/policies/terms-of-use
https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy

title: Lolo
description: Lolo app allows to book a taxi in Brazil, Uganda and Belarus. With Lolo ride hailing app you can travel and explore with ease! RIDE HAILING TECH Lolo offers safe rides for a reasonable price, our drivers are well prepared. Lolo offers discounts and promos for orders. PRECISE TAXI BILLING Lolo system uses modern algorithm for calculation of the order price. Fraudulent fares are not possible with our taxi system. With Lolo client is assured of right price PRECISE MAPS Lolo uses modern geolocation system. With our booking app your driver won't have problems with finding pick up location. AVAILABLE 24/7 Lolo taxi booking app is here to drive anytime. At the moment our drivers are available in Brazil (Campo Grande, Corumbá, Dourados, Florianopolis), Uganda (Kampala, Entebbe, Jinja City), Belarus (Minsk). With Lolo you get safe premium & economy taxi and other on-demand services in one app. See you on board in Brazil, Uganda and Belarus.

title: VandiPlay(반디플레이)
description:
1. One-touch automatic pest control using cadastral maps and Naver high-definition maps
2. Automatic takeoff/automatic control/return to takeoff location/landing function
     - Precise altitude maintenance through 25GHz radar during pest control
3. Easy pest control settings (liquid, granule, centrifugal nozzle support)
     - Spray height, spray width, safety distance, chemical payload, spray amount
4. Compatible with 4 different remote controllers (SKYDROID T12/H12, SIYI VD32/MK15)
     - FPV video provided front or front/rear (depending on the type of remote controller)
6. Provides the Bandi Team function, a collaboration tool for pest control teams and pest control workers.
descriptionHTML:
1. One-touch automatic pest control using cadastral maps and Naver high-definition maps
2. Automatic takeoff/automatic control/return to takeoff location/landing function
- Precise altitude maintenance through 25GHz radar during pest control
3. Easy pest control settings (liquid, granule, centrifugal nozzle support)
- Spray height, spray width, safety distance, chemical payload, spray amount
4. Compatible with 4 different remote controllers (SKYDROID T12/H12, SIYI VD32/MK15)
- FPV video provided front or front/rear (depending on the type of remote controller)
6. Provides the Bandi Team function, a collaboration tool for pest control teams and pest control workers.
summary: Intosky PREX and Vandi series cadastral map automatic control GCS app for control drones/collaboration function for control operators

title: Naïo Companion
description:
Discover Naïo Companion - the brand new supervision application for Naïo Technologie's range of robots. Whether you are supervising your robot locally or remotely, Naïo Companion allows you to monitor and control your robots with ease.

Thanks to Naïo Companion, you can easily visualize the behavior of your robot in real time. Whether you are supervising a single robot or several, our application is designed to help you manage your robot fleet efficiently.

When you are connected to the robot via wifi, Naïo Companion allows you to control the robot remotely using your smartphone. You can easily adjust your robot's settings in real time and make quick decisions to improve its mission performance.

Even when you are far from your robot, Naïo Companion allows you to efficiently supervise your fleet. Thanks to an internet connection, you can continue to adjust some settings, as well as stop and resume your robots' missions at any time and any place.

With Naïo Companion, supervising your robot fleet has never been so easy and efficient. Download now the Naïo Companion application and start supervising your robot fleet with ease.

----

New Version 5.0 Available!

We're delighted to announce the latest update to Naïo Companion! This version brings a number of significant improvements to make your experience even smoother and more intuitive.

Mission History: "Operations"
  •. Operation: Automatic merging of nearby missions (time and location) implemented.
  •. Global Tracking: Time, distances, average speed, etc.
Robot Statistics
  •. New Performance Monitoring Screen: Completed missions, kilometers traveled, total and operational time.
  •. Charts: Mode usage and distance distribution by map.
Diagnostic Page
  •. Visual Analysis of Key Components: Navigation, energy, traction, safety, etc.
  •. Additional Robot-Specific Information: Added based on the robot model.
Simplified Maintenance
  •. Tests and Calibrations: IMU, compass, steering, and log recovery made accessible.
  •. Integrated Updates: OTA (over-the-air) or via USB key.
User Experience (UX) and Fixes
  •. Dark Mode Fixes: Corrected visual inconsistencies.
  •. Improved Pop-Ups and Error Messages: Enhanced explanations for better guidance.
  •. Critical Bug Fixes: Addressed GPS loss, incorrect display, freezes, etc.
  •. Streamlined Menus: Removed unnecessary elements for simplicity.
  •. Enhanced Oz Remote Control.
Modernized Authentication
  •. New Session and User Authentication Service: Simplified and integrated management.
Mission Configuration-Specific Features
  •. Boisselet Configuration: Margin management for tools.
  •. Automatic Tool Pre-Configuration: For previously used tools.
Supervision Improvements
  •. Real-Time Information: Added data for tool height, speed, and current row.
  •. Refined GPS Route: Adjusted to reflect only validated data.

Download the latest version of Naïo Companion now to enjoy all these improvements and more! We thank you for your continued support and valuable feedback, which have allowed us to evolve our application.

title: Solinftec Solix
description:
Solix app is designed to monitor the daily routines of robots on the farm.

The app aims to facilitate access to not only general information, such as robot status, tank level, RPM, flow, and pump pressure, but also mission-related data. Users can predict when the mission will end and access information about the robot's location.

Additionally, the app allows users to execute several actions or commands, including starting the supply, performing tank leveling, conducting spray bar recirculation, initiating nozzle cleaning, or stopping any of these actions.
descriptionHTML:
Solix app is designed to monitor the daily routines of robots on the farm.

The app aims to facilitate access to not only general information, such as robot status, tank level, RPM, flow, and pump pressure, but also mission-related data. Users can predict when the mission will end and access information about the robot's location.

Additionally, the app allows users to execute several actions or commands, including starting the supply, performing tank leveling, conducting spray bar recirculation, initiating nozzle cleaning, or stopping any of these actions.
summary: Solinftec's Solix app

title: FarmDroid App
description:
FarmDroid is the world’s first fully automatic robot that can take care of both sowing and weed control. With the FarmDroid robot we help farmers and plant breeders reduce their costs of sowing and weeding and we even do it in a CO2 neutral and ecological way.

The company FarmDroid ApS was founded in 2018 by the two brothers Jens Warming and Kristian Warming together with the Danish innovation environment Syddansk Innovation A/S and the acknowledged robot expert Esben Østergaard.

So far in 2022, the FarmDroid has already seeded and weeded 18.000 hectares spread over UK, Canada and large parts of Europe.

FarmDroid is the world’s first fully automatic robot that can take care of both sowing and weed control. With the FarmDroid robot we help farmers and plant breeders reduce their costs of sowing and weeding and we even do it in a CO2 neutral and ecological way.

The company FarmDroid ApS was founded in 2018 by the two brothers Jens Warming and Kristian Warming together with the Danish innovation environment Syddansk Innovation A/S and the acknowledged robot expert Esben Østergaard.

So far in 2022, the FarmDroid has already seeded and weeded 18.000 hectares spread over UK, Canada and large parts of Europe.
summary: The world’s first seeding and weeding robot

title: Myo Plus
description:
New functions:

New design
Usability improvements
Myo Connect functionality
Bug fixes


About this app:

What’s new:

We have made further improvements to the user-friendliness of the app based on feedback from our users:
The app has a new design and bug fixes will improve the stability of the application.

The optional Myo Connect function records activity data for your prosthesis and presents it clearly for you in the Myo Plus app. This means that you can independently access up-to-date information about how you are using your prosthesis.

In addition, you can share prosthesis data with the relevant qualified personnel. Once you have given your consent, they will receive information about the current state of the prosthesis, system settings and usage data in order to give you the best possible remote support in the event of problems.


General:

You can use the Myo Plus app from Ottobock to configure the Myo Plus prosthesis control and adapt it to changing requirements at any time. For this purpose, the Myo Plus app connects to the Myo Plus TR installed in the prosthesis or to the Myo cuff.

Key app functions include:

As qualified personnel: evaluate movement patterns and create a basic set.
As a user: record individual movement patterns and adapt the prosthesis control to your everyday situations.
Fine-tune parameters and switch functions on or off.
Send prosthesis data to the cloud for further use.

The following terminal devices are compatible with Myo Plus pattern recognition. The designation of the terminal device can be found on the cover of the instructions for use:

System Electric Hand DMC plus: 8E38=6, 8E39=6, 8E41=6
SensorHand Speed: 8E38=8, 8E39=8, 8E41=8
MyoHand VariPlus Speed: 8E38=9, 8E39=9, 8E41=9
Transcarpal Hand DMC plus: 8E44=6
System Electric Greifer DMC VariPlus: 8E33=9, 8E34=9
System Electric Greifer DMC VariPlus: 8E33=9-1, 8E34=9-1
bebionic hand EQD: 8E70=*
bebionic hand Short Wrist: 8E71=*
bebionic hand Flex: 8E72=*

For more information, please contact the relevant qualified personnel or myoplus@ottobock.com


Manufacturer:
Otto Bock Healthcare Products GmbH
Brehmstraße 16 · 1110 Vienna · Austria
T +43-1 523 37 86 · F +43-1 523 22 64
info.austria@ottobock.com · www.ottobock.com

This product corresponds to the applicable European specifications for medical devices.

title: Flat Cube: 2D Brain Cube
description: Flat Cube is a brain cube game designed with an intuitive and simple 2D approach, unlike complex 3D cube puzzles. While easy to pick up, it requires strategic thinking due to limited space and cube tile counts. Solve the cube puzzle within the recommended slide count to experience the ultimate sense of achievement. Key Features 1. Simple but Strategic 2D Cube Puzzle Experience deep cube puzzle gameplay without complicated 3D controls. The intuitive cube design allows anyone to enjoy the game easily. 2. Four Colored Cube Tiles with a Locking System Place cube tiles in the correct color areas. Correctly placed tiles lock in place, letting you focus on the remaining cubes. For a tougher challenge, you can disable the locking system. 3. Brain Cube Game Focused on Slide Optimization Each cube puzzle has a recommended slide count. Challenge yourself to achieve a perfect clear within this limit, enhancing your problem-solving skills by planning optimal moves. 4. Five Difficulty Levels - Easy (4x4 Cube): Perfect for beginners - Normal (6x6 Cube): Balanced challenge and fun - Hard (8x8 Cube): Requires strategic cube-solving skills - Master (10x10 Cube): High-level puzzles for skilled players - Legend (12x12 Cube): The ultimate challenge for true cube masters 5. Daily Cube Challenges A new cube puzzle is available every day in daily challenge mode, offering continuous fun and special rewards. 6. Achievements and Badge System Earn badges by achieving perfect clears and consecutive successes. Compete with friends and showcase your cube-solving accomplishments. 7. Improve Spatial Awareness and Cognitive Skills Strategically arrange cube tiles to naturally boost spatial perception and problem-solving abilities. Experience the joy of perfect solutions with Flat Cube, where simple rules meet strategic depth.
descriptionHTML:
Flat Cube is a brain cube game designed with an intuitive and simple 2D approach, unlike complex 3D cube puzzles. While easy to pick up, it requires strategic thinking due to limited space and cube tile counts. Solve the cube puzzle within the recommended slide count to experience the ultimate sense of achievement.

Key Features

1. Simple but Strategic 2D Cube Puzzle
Experience deep cube puzzle gameplay without complicated 3D controls. The intuitive cube design allows anyone to enjoy the game easily.

2. Four Colored Cube Tiles with a Locking System
Place cube tiles in the correct color areas. Correctly placed tiles lock in place, letting you focus on the remaining cubes. For a tougher challenge, you can disable the locking system.

3. Brain Cube Game Focused on Slide Optimization
Each cube puzzle has a recommended slide count. Challenge yourself to achieve a perfect clear within this limit, enhancing your problem-solving skills by planning optimal moves.

4. Five Difficulty Levels

- Easy (4x4 Cube): Perfect for beginners
- Normal (6x6 Cube): Balanced challenge and fun
- Hard (8x8 Cube): Requires strategic cube-solving skills
- Master (10x10 Cube): High-level puzzles for skilled players
- Legend (12x12 Cube): The ultimate challenge for true cube masters

5. Daily Cube Challenges
A new cube puzzle is available every day in daily challenge mode, offering continuous fun and special rewards.

6. Achievements and Badge System
Earn badges by achieving perfect clears and consecutive successes. Compete with friends and showcase your cube-solving accomplishments.

7. Improve Spatial Awareness and Cognitive Skills
Strategically arrange cube tiles to naturally boost spatial perception and problem-solving abilities.

Experience the joy of perfect solutions with Flat Cube, where simple rules meet strategic depth.
summary: Slide Smart. Solve the 2D Brain Cube!

title: Lyft
description:
Get where you’re going with Lyft.

Whether you’re catching a flight, going out for the night, commuting to the office, or running errands in a rush, the Lyft app offers you multiple ways to get there.

EASY TO USE
Enter your destination. See your route and ride cost up front. Choose Priority Pickup to get going quick. Boom. Done. Simple

CHOOSE YOUR WHEELS
Choose from Wait & Save, Priority Pickup, Bikes & Scooters, Lyft XL, Lyft Lux, Transit, or even Rentals.

AFFORDABLE RIDES
Our Wait & Save option helps you get around for less. And you can find the fastest public transit routes, too.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.
—
Prices vary based on market condition.

By downloading the app, you agree to allow Lyft to collect your device's language settings.

title: connectgo.pro by ottobock.
description:
connectgo.pro by ottobock. allows O&P professionals to install microprocessor-controlled prostheses and orthoses for lower limbs according to the needs and mobility of the patient. 
Therapists can adjust the settings of certain prostheses in some areas and use feedback functions for training purposes. 

The additional functions are:
- Standard behaviour setting for prostheses and orthoses
- MyModes settings for special movement patterns and situations
- Calibration or static measurement and optimisation
- Status information display 

The instructions for use are available online https://product-documents.ottobock.com/IFU/INT/560X29-2/647G1834/07/O/S/F

title: Unitree Go
description:
key spotlight of the App
1. AI large language model
Embodied AI: AI+robot; large language model empowerment makes human-robot interaction more interesting
2. OTA upgrades
After being authorized by user, the robot will connect to Unitree Cloud to upgrade its programme via OTA, thus enhancing user experience.
3. HD image quality
High-quality image transmission enables users to enjoy smooth video and distinct image
4. Intelligent Avoidance
Agile 4D LiDAR L1 detects forward obstacles, realizes intelligent avoidance and maps and plots the real 3D world.
5. Precise control
Dual stickers for precise control, real-time monitoring of the shooting screen and point cloud map; push button for easy mode switching.
6. Graphical Programming 
Optimized and easy-understanding graphical programming makes program design available within simple operations.

title: limo x
description:
Limox is your smart companion for discovering and tracking your favorite movies, TV shows, and stars — all in one place, with no login required.

Explore a rich database of titles from around the world, including:
Posters, trailers, genres, ratings, and release details  
 Full cast and crew information  
 User reviews and star-based ratings  
 Personalized watchlists and custom lists  
 Advanced filters by genre, director, actor, rating, age restriction, and more  

With Limox, you can follow your favorite actors and get notified when they appear in new titles. Stay up to date when your tracked shows release new episodes. Logged-in users can rate movies, leave comments, and interact with other cinephiles.

 Smart spoiler protection: Comments that may reveal key plot points are automatically hidden using AI until you choose to view them.

Key features:
• Completely free and ad-supported  
• Available in English and Persian  
• Guest access supported — no account required to browse  
• Google Sign-In for comment and list features  
• Custom lists and favorites  
• Notifications for new episodes and actor appearances  
• Clean and responsive UI  

Whether you’re a casual viewer or a true film lover, Limox helps you discover what to watch, track what you love, and connect with others — smarter and easier than ever.

Download Limox and explore the world of cinema today!

title: Robotics!
description:
Teach your robot to walk and become the best robot trainer in the world! Teach your robot to fight and battle against real players!

Welcome to a new hit from C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars and Cut the Rope creators — Robotics! Build your own battle robot from various spare parts, then program it to walk and fight. Watch it clash with real players from all over the world in hilarious physics-based battles. Unlock new details, arenas and more!

KEY FEATURES:
- Hilarious robot teaching mechanic: by dragging parts of the robot in different directions, players create complex movements that the robot repeats.
- Physics-based fights: the way your battle robot collides with other battle robots and the environment results in crazy, surprising and funny moments.
- PvP battles against real players: there are thousands battle robot trainers like yourself all over the world. Prove that you're the best!
- Variety of battle robots and parts: bodies, arms, legs and weapons for your battle robot allow for infinite combinations and tactics.
- Competitions and special prizes: climb on top the leaderboard and get amazing rewards that cannot be obtained anywhere else1
- Black Belt Masters: progress through the game to unlock new fighting belts for your battle robots. Only the strongest ones will be aknowledged as Black Belt Masters!

Download Robotics now and become the best battle robot trainer in the world!
descriptionHTML:
Teach your robot to walk and become the best robot trainer in the world! Teach your robot to fight and battle against real players!

Welcome to a new hit from C.A.T.S.: Crash Arena Turbo Stars and Cut the Rope creators — Robotics! Build your own battle robot from various spare parts, then program it to walk and fight. Watch it clash with real players from all over the world in hilarious physics-based battles. Unlock new details, arenas and more!

KEY FEATURES:
- Hilarious robot teaching mechanic: by dragging parts of the robot in different directions, players create complex movements that the robot repeats.
- Physics-based fights: the way your battle robot collides with other battle robots and the environment results in crazy, surprising and funny moments.
- PvP battles against real players: there are thousands battle robot trainers like yourself all over the world. Prove that you're the best!
- Variety of battle robots and parts: bodies, arms, legs and weapons for your battle robot allow for infinite combinations and tactics.
- Competitions and special prizes: climb on top the leaderboard and get amazing rewards that cannot be obtained anywhere else1
- Black Belt Masters: progress through the game to unlock new fighting belts for your battle robots. Only the strongest ones will be aknowledged as Black Belt Masters!

Download Robotics now and become the best battle robot trainer in the world!
summary: Teach your robot to walk and fight in PVP battles

title: Northern Lite by EC Transit
description:
Northern Lite is Eau Claire Transit's new way to get around Eau Claire — a ridesharing service that’s easy, affordable, and green.

 With a few taps or a phone call, book an on-demand ride, and technology will pair you with other people headed your way. 

How it works:
- Book a ride on your phone or call.
- Get picked up on a nearby corner.
- Share your ride with others.
- Save cash and reduce carbon emissions.

What Eau Claire Transit’s Northern Lite service is about:

SHARED.

A corner-to-corner algorithm matches people headed in the same direction. This means you’re getting the convenience and comfort of a private ride with the efficiency, speed, and affordability of a public one.

ACCESS.

For residents who are in areas with less bus coverage, get where you need to go in just one trip, or connect to the bus and go even further. Plus, you don’t have to worry about parking!

SUSTAINABLE.

Public transportation reduces the number of vehicles on the roads, bringing down congestion and CO2 emissions. With a couple of taps, you get to do your part to make your city a little bit greener and cleaner every time you ride.

title: Zenless Zone Zero
description:
Don't go into Hollows.
I know, I know, there are Ether resources in the Hollows, bizarre creations, even ruins of the old civilization — all invaluable treasures.
But don't forget about the spatial disorder, the monsters, and mutants running rampant. Ultimately, this is a disaster that could swallow the world. Hollows are not where ordinary people should go.
So don't go into Hollows.
Or at least, don't go in alone.
If you insist on getting into danger, go to New Eridu first.
This city full of people from all walks of life has many who need the Hollows: powerful and wealthy tycoons, gangs who rule the streets, schemers hiding in the shadows, and ruthless officials.
Make your preparations there, find strong allies, and most importantly...
Find a "Proxy."
Only they can guide people out of labyrinthian Hollows.
Good luck.

Zenless Zone Zero is an all-new 3D action game from HoYoverse that takes place in a near future, with the world plagued by a mysterious disaster known as "Hollows."

Dual Identities, a Singular Experience
In the near future, a mysterious natural disaster known as "Hollows" has occurred. A new kind of city has emerged in this disaster-ridden world — New Eridu. This last oasis has mastered the technology to co-exist with Hollows and is home to a whole host of chaotic, boisterous, dangerous, and very active factions. As a professional Proxy, you play a crucial role in linking the city and the Hollows. Your story awaits.

Build Your Squad and Fight Fast-Paced Battles
Zenless Zone Zero is an all-new 3D action game from HoYoverse, here to provide a thrilling combat experience. Build a squad of up to three and begin your assault with Basic and Special Attacks. Dodge and Parry to neutralize your opponents' counterattacks, and when they're Stunned, unleash a powerful combo of Chain Attacks to finish them off! Remember, different opponents have different traits, and it would be prudent to use their weaknesses to your advantage.

Immerse Yourself in the Unique Style and Music
Zenless Zone Zero has a unique visual style and design. With its carefully crafted character expressions and fluid movements, you'll easily feel immersed in the fascinating world as you embark on your own journey~ And of course, every VIP deserves their very own soundtrack, so you'll also have emotional beats full of drip to accompany you in each unforgettable moment~

Various Factions and Stories Entwined
Random Play can't operate without videotapes, and Proxies can't operate without Agents. In New Eridu, customers from all walks will come knocking. So don't be fooled by their innocent and cute appearances, don't be afraid of those who tower over you and look dangerous, and don't turn away the fluffy ones who might shed fur all over your spotless floor. Go and talk with them, learn about their unique experiences, and allow them to become your friends and allies. After all, this is a long path, and only with companions will you be able to walk far~

OfficialWebsite: https://zenless.hoyoverse.com/en-us/
Customer Service Email: zzzcs_en@hoyoverse.com

title: Magibot
description:
The Odyssey of the last chance in puzzle games for kids

Follow the adventures of ILO, a small magician robot sent by humans to a planet of last resort in strategy war games.
 With its pointed hat and Magic Book, Ilo explores a world full of hostile creatures to find the terraforming beacons in puzzle games for kids. It makes its way using “magical” blocks in puzzle games for kids. The powers to fly, stop time or pass through objects are all powers that will help it overcome obstacles and bravely continue its odyssey in strategy war games.
Maginot combines the principles of a platform game and those of a strategy game and strategy war games. Wisely place the action blocks upstream before taking control of your character in puzzle games for kids.

Features:
- Unique blend of a platform game and a strategy game in puzzle games for kids
- 9 magical powers to acquire in puzzle games for kids and strategy war games.
- 40 Highly interactive Levels in strategy war games
- 2 game modes: Puzzle and Action in strategy war games

title: Baby-Led Weaning Recipes
description:
The Baby-Led Weaning Recipes app contains over 800 delicious recipes (all suitable from 6 months), with monthly guides and routines, to support busy parents and make your weaning journey as easy and enjoyable as possible.

My goal is to supply you with recipes that are quick to prepare, yet nutrient-rich so that your baby can grow up enjoying healthy and nutritious but, above all, TASTY foods!

Key app features:
* 800+ delicious, family-friendly recipes
* A clean, bright design that is easy to navigate
* Monthly guides and routines (from 6-12 months)
* Recipes divided into breakfast, lunch, dinner and snack sections
* Search for your favourite family recipes by recipe name and ingredient
* Save your favourites so they are easy to find
* A bonus ‘special occasions’ section for parties and seasonal family events
* Free help and support, directly or via my online support group
* Free app updates and improvements on a regular basis

New features:
* Two new recipes added every week (except for a two week Christmas break)
* Add recipe ingredients directly into your shopping basket
* A guide on how to prepare your child’s first finger foods
* Filter recipes by your specific dietary requirements (vegetarian, vegan, dairy free and egg free)
* Search for recipes by ingredient, as well as by recipe name
* A new ‘like’ button feature so that you can quickly identify the most popular recipes
* Fun recipe videos on selected dishes

Access Exclusive Recipes:
The app comes with over 250 delicious recipes, with one new added every week for free as part of the initial cost - what incredible value! If you would like to support the app further, there is now an opportunity for you to enjoy an extra 48+ exclusive recipes every year!

The Quarterly Subscription to Baby-Led Weaning Recipes is available for £1.99 per quarter (this may differ depending on your currency). These recipes will be delicious, nutritious and seasonal – allowing you an increasing number of recipes at your fingertips to keep things fresh and new in your kitchen.

Terms of Use:
https://babyledweaningcookbook.com/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy:
https://babyledweaningcookbook.com/privacy-policy

I hope you enjoy the recipes. Please do contact me if you have any questions or require any support; I am always happy to help.

Natalie x

title: World Robot Boxing 2
description:
Robot Boxing has evolved. Have you? 

Conquer the new World Robot Boxing Championship and seize it all! Join the breed of the most advanced Robots in their battle for supremacy. The most advanced and spectacular arcade action Robot boxing game calls you out to crush your enemies, conquer mighty bosses, and become the next great Robot Boxing legend. Enter the ring and fight like there’s no tomorrow! Reign supreme as the Ultimate World Robot Boxing Champion once again. #BRINGIT

BECOME THE CHAMPION
Champions are made in the ring! From hidden underground fights, to all the way up to becoming the World Champion, this Robot Fighting Game combines heroic storytelling with spectacular action. Recruit the ultimate team of steel warriors and enter the squared circle for the grittiest mech battles. Arm your robots with crazy abilities, hone your skills with hours of training, KO your opponents with awesome signature moves and fight until you top the Leaderboards. Compete for the World Robot Boxing Championship Title.

FUTURISTIC ROBOTS
Unleash a pantheon of robot boxing champions and train them to new heights as you enter the ultimate contest! It's no more just about the size. With abilities and class advantages, robot fighting is now much more complex. Create your squad of ultimate fighting machines with distinctive character classes. Each class has its unique strengths and fighting advantages over the other, and every robot has its own set of Abilities. So, who you bring to the fight matters! Pair-up specific Robots to trigger abilities based on their synergy. Get ready to elevate the WRB2 action with new robot titans and far advanced versions of legendary fan favorite superstars from the World Robot Boxing Universe.

GAMEPLAY AND CONTROLS
The greatest battles in Robot Boxing history are in your hands! Unleash epic combos with powerful skills on your opponents to define your own fighting style in this epic action-RPG! Experience breathtaking gameplay cinematics, as your steel warriors unleash dynamic combos with the touch of a finger. Feel the real steel clash with every punch and every kick. Destroy your opponents with intuitive fighting interface controls and unleash explosive special moves. Block to avoid your opponent's attacks and strike back with a perfect counter. Immerse deep into the best steel crushing arcade action fighting experience. Know your opponent, engage with them, spot their weakness, formulate a strategy and dive into the fight.

CONQUER BATTLEGROUNDS
Journey through an exciting storyline and transform your steel warriors into powerful Champions by battling in Story Mode, and Global Tournaments spanning across iconic locations. Knock out rivals from around the world or play with friends to settle this once and for all in dynamic Versus Battles and weekly Live Events. Who will be the one to deliver the final knockout? Explore dynamic quests and engage in a healthy dose of action-packed fighting. Diversify your roster, level up your mech monsters to upgrade their stats and unlock their full potential!

FEATURES:
- 67 Robots from 14 Countries
- 6 Robot Classes
- 12 Exciting Arenas
- 48 Over-the-Top Signature Moves
- Multiple Game Modes
- Rank-up and Level-up items
- Milestone and Rank Rewards

Achieve greatness in the future of Robot Boxing where only the strongest will survive. Join the league of Champions.

The game is free to download and play. Some in-game items can be purchased with real money. You can restrict in-app purchases in Store settings.

Permissions:
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress

Twitter - @wrbgame
Instagram - @wrbofficial
Facebook - www.facebook.com/WorldRobotBoxingGame
Youtube - www.youtube.com/user/RelianceGames
Reddit - www.reddit.com/r/WorldRobotBoxing
Website - www.reliancegames.com

Terms & Conditions : https://www.reliancegames.com/terms-conditions/

Pair-up specific Robots to trigger abilities based on their synergy. Get ready to elevate the WRB2 action with new robot titans and far advanced versions of legendary fan favorite superstars from the World Robot Boxing Universe.

GAMEPLAY AND CONTROLS
The greatest battles in Robot Boxing history are in your hands! Unleash epic combos with powerful skills on your opponents to define your own fighting style in this epic action-RPG! Experience breathtaking gameplay cinematics, as your steel warriors unleash dynamic combos with the touch of a finger. Feel the real steel clash with every punch and every kick. Destroy your opponents with intuitive fighting interface controls and unleash explosive special moves. Block to avoid your opponent's attacks and strike back with a perfect counter. Immerse deep into the best steel crushing arcade action fighting experience. Know your opponent, engage with them, spot their weakness, formulate a strategy and dive into the fight.

CONQUER BATTLEGROUNDS
Journey through an exciting storyline and transform your steel warriors into powerful Champions by battling in Story Mode, and Global Tournaments spanning across iconic locations. Knock out rivals from around the world or play with friends to settle this once and for all in dynamic Versus Battles and weekly Live Events. Who will be the one to deliver the final knockout? Explore dynamic quests and engage in a healthy dose of action-packed fighting. Diversify your roster, level up your mech monsters to upgrade their stats and unlock their full potential!

FEATURES:
- 67 Robots from 14 Countries
- 6 Robot Classes
- 12 Exciting Arenas
- 48 Over-the-Top Signature Moves
- Multiple Game Modes
- Rank-up and Level-up items
- Milestone and Rank Rewards

Achieve greatness in the future of Robot Boxing where only the strongest will survive. Join the league of Champions.

The game is free to download and play. Some in-game items can be purchased with real money. You can restrict in-app purchases in Store settings.

Permissions:
READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress

title: AE + Aerie
description: Style is in the doing. How do you wear yours?    In the store or on the go, the AEO app is here to give you a seamless shopping experience. So you can focus more on discovering the looks that express YOUR individual style. Get all the latest AEO and Aerie at your fingertips, including your favorite jeans, shoes, accessories, bras, undies, sleepwear and more.    But that's not all! Check out some of the perks:   • Link your Real Rewards account to earn points toward fast, flexible rewards while you shop! • Buy online and pick up In-Store or Curbside! Choose “Free Store Pickup” at checkout. Available at select stores. • Shopping from outside the U.S.? You can now select the Canadian or international version of the app in App Settings to see pricing, sales, and promotions tailored to your location! Plus, Canadian customers can translate the app into French. • Love it so much that you just CAN'T WAIT? See whether an item is in stock at an AE or Aerie store near you • Use Favorites to save the styles you love in one place. Shop them later or share with friends and fam! • Snap & Scan uses your phone's camera to scan barcodes in stores and to show you styles similar to anything you see and love with the snap of a picture! • Find tons of #OOTD inspo, trends and more under the Inspiration tab • Get instant notifications about sales and other awesome events • Use Voice Search to find exactly what you’re looking for • Tune in to our in-store AE + Aerie playlists, curated just for you! • Get up close and personal with our latest styles thanks to full-screen photos Thoughts? Feedback? Awkward family photos you'd like to share with us? Go on, pour your heart out to AEOMobile@ae.com. And be sure to keep an eye out for app improvements, new features and more.

title: Growbot
description:
Growbot is a 2D point&click adventure about a robot saving her home from a dark crystalline force. Set upon a beautiful biopunk space station bursting with fantastic plants and aliens, you play as Nara, a growbot in training to become a captain. When your station home is attacked by rapidly growing crystals, it's down to you to save it.
The game is inspired by classic adventure games like Loom, modern adventure games like Machinarium, and aims to appeal to both seasoned and new gamers.

Features
• Explore a beautiful space station and repair its strange machinery.
• Interact with fantastic plants and aliens.
• Use your Brain(apilla) to solve puzzles.
• Collect the sounds of flowers and combine them to create powerful shields.
• Meet a fluffy white hologram called Star Belly with a galaxy inside.
• Unearth a tale of flower power with twisted roots.
• Art by award winning illustrator Lisa Evans.
• Beautiful music by musician Jessica Fichot.
• Text localizations in Spanish, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Chinese, Korean and Japanese.

title: UR+ AR
description: Bring robotics into your world with our augmented reality app. This innovative tool allows you to digitally position a Universal Robots arm in your real space, seamlessly turning your surroundings into a digital twin. Ideal for testing robot movements and reachability within your factory or workspace, the app helps you visualize and simulate robotic operations without needing to recreate a digital model of your environment. Discover the power of AR-enhanced robotics visualization and streamline your workflow with ease!
